SID_速さ魔防の干渉1.name: Spd/Res Snag 1
SID_速さ魔防の干渉1.description:
If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition,
Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets
unit, inflicts Spd/Res-2 on nearest foes within
4 spaces of both unit and target through their
next actions.

SID_速さ魔防の干渉2.name: Spd/Res Snag 2
SID_速さ魔防の干渉2.description:
If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition,
Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets
unit, inflicts Spd/Res-4 on nearest foes within
4 spaces of both unit and target through their
next actions.

SID_速さ魔防の干渉3.name: Spd/Res Snag 3
SID_速さ魔防の干渉3.description:
If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition,
Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets
unit, inflicts Spd/Res-6 on nearest foes within
4 spaces of both unit and target through their
next actions.

SID_守備の鼓舞4.name: Fortify Def 4
SID_守備の鼓舞4.description:
At start of turn, grants Def+7 to adjacent allies for
1 turn.

SID_至聖ティルフィング.name: Virtuous Tyrfing
SID_至聖ティルフィング.description:
Grants Res+3. If foe initiates combat or if unit's
HP < 100% at start of combat, inflicts Atk/Def-6
on foe during combat, and if unit deals damage
to foe during combat, restores 7 HP to unit.
(Triggers even if 0 damage is dealt.)

SID_最後の聖戦.name: Holy War's End
SID_最後の聖戦.description:
If unit's HP ≥ 50% and foe initiates combat,
unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack
before foe can make a follow-up attack.

SID_黒皇子の槍.name: Dark Royal Spear
SID_黒皇子の槍.description:
If foe initiates combat or if foe's HP = 100% at
start of combat, grants Atk/Def/Res+5 to unit
during combat.

SID_冥輝のブレス.name: Gloom Breath
SID_冥輝のブレス.description:
At start of turn, inflicts Atk/Spd-7 on foes
within 2 spaces through their next actions.
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Atk/Spd-7 on target and foes within 2 spaces
of target through their next actions. If foe's
Range = 2, calculates damage using the lower
of foe's Def or Res.

SID_海角の星槍.name: Starpoint Lance
SID_海角の星槍.description:
Grants Spd+3. During unit's first combat
in player phase or enemy phase, grants
Atk/Spd/Def/Res+5 to unit and restores
10 HP to unit after combat.

SID_花の髪飾り.name: Hidden Thorns
SID_花の髪飾り.description:
$aDuring unit's first combat in player phase or
enemy phase, grants Atk/Res+5 to unit and
restores 7 HP to unit after combat.

Effect:【Dagger ５】

【Dagger ５】
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-５ on target and foes within
2 spaces of target through their next actions.

SID_花の髪飾り＋.name: Hidden Thorns+
SID_花の髪飾り＋.description:
$aDuring unit's first combat in player phase or
enemy phase, grants Atk/Res+5 to unit and
restores 7 HP to unit after combat.

Effect:【Dagger ７】

【Dagger ７】
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-７ on target and foes within
2 spaces of target through their next actions.

SID_盛夏の神宝.name: Sun's Percussors
SID_盛夏の神宝.description:
Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
At start of combat, if unit's Spd > foe's Spd or
if foe's HP = 100%, grants Atk/Spd+5 to unit
during combat and neutralizes effects that
guarantee foe's follow-up attacks and effects
that prevent unit's follow-up attacks.

SID_ほら貝のブーケ.name: Conch Bouquet
SID_ほら貝のブーケ.description:
During unit's first combat in player phase or
enemy phase, grants Atk/Res+5 to unit and
restores 7 HP to unit after combat.

SID_ほら貝のブーケ＋.name: Conch Bouquet+
SID_ほら貝のブーケ＋.description:
During unit's first combat in player phase or
enemy phase, grants Atk/Res+5 to unit and
restores 7 HP to unit after combat.

SID_メロンフロート.name: Melon Float
SID_メロンフロート.description:
During unit's first combat in player phase or
enemy phase, grants Atk/Res+5 to unit and
restores 7 HP to unit after combat.

SID_メロンフロート＋.name: Melon Float+
SID_メロンフロート＋.description:
During unit's first combat in player phase or
enemy phase, grants Atk/Res+5 to unit and
restores 7 HP to unit after combat.

SID_速さ魔防の封印1.name: Chill Spd/Res 1
SID_速さ魔防の封印1.description:
At start of turn, inflicts Spd/Res-3 on foe on
the enemy team with the highest Spd+Res total
through its next action.

SID_速さ魔防の封印2.name: Chill Spd/Res 2
SID_速さ魔防の封印2.description:
At start of turn, inflicts Spd/Res-5 on foe on
the enemy team with the highest Spd+Res total
through its next action.

SID_警戒姿勢1.name: Guard Bearing 1
SID_警戒姿勢1.description:
During unit's first combat in enemy phase,
if foe initiates combat, reduces damage from
foe's first attack by 30%.

SID_警戒姿勢2.name: Guard Bearing 2
SID_警戒姿勢2.description:
During unit's first combat in enemy phase,
if foe initiates combat, reduces damage from
foe's first attack by 40%.

SID_警戒姿勢3.name: Guard Bearing 3
SID_警戒姿勢3.description:
During unit's first combat in enemy phase,
if foe initiates combat, reduces damage from
foe's first attack by 50%.

SID_攻撃の魅了1.name: Atk Cantrip 1
SID_攻撃の魅了1.description:
If Sing or Dance is used, inflicts Atk-3 on
nearest foes within 4 spaces of unit through
their next actions.

SID_攻撃の魅了2.name: Atk Cantrip 2
SID_攻撃の魅了2.description:
If Sing or Dance is used, inflicts Atk-5 on
nearest foes within 4 spaces of unit through
their next actions.

SID_攻撃の魅了3.name: Atk Cantrip 3
SID_攻撃の魅了3.description:
If Sing or Dance is used, inflicts Atk-7 on
nearest foes within 4 spaces of unit through
their next actions.

SID_影の英雄の剣.name: Blade of Shadow
SID_影の英雄の剣.description:
Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
If foe initiates combat or if foe's HP = 100% at
start of combat, neutralizes penalties on unit
and inflicts Atk/Spd/Def-5 on foe during
combat.

SID_影の英雄の槍.name: Spear of Shadow
SID_影の英雄の槍.description:
Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
If foe initiates combat or if foe's HP = 100% at
start of combat, neutralizes penalties on unit
and inflicts Atk/Spd/Def-5 on foe during
combat.

SID_騎殺の暗器.name: Caltrop Dagger
SID_騎殺の暗器.description:
$aEffective against cavalry foes. Disables unit's
and foe's skills that change attack priority.
Effect:【Dagger ５】

【Dagger ５】
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-５ on target and foes within
2 spaces of target through their next actions.

SID_騎殺の暗器＋.name: Caltrop Dagger+
SID_騎殺の暗器＋.description:
$aEffective against cavalry foes. Disables unit's
and foe's skills that change attack priority.
Effect:【Dagger ７】

【Dagger ７】
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-７ on target and foes within
2 spaces of target through their next actions.

SID_悪夢の女王の角.name: Nightmare Horn
SID_悪夢の女王の角.description:
Grants Spd+3. Unit can counterattack
regardless of foe's range. If unit's Spd > foe's
Spd, reduces damage from attacks during
combat and from area-of-effect Specials
(excluding Røkkr area-of-effect Specials) by
percentage = difference between stats × 4
(max 40%).

At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast
or dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any
ally, unit transforms (otherwise, unit reverts).
If unit transforms, grants Atk+2, and if unit
initiates combat, inflicts Atk/Def-4 on foe
during combat and foe cannot make a
follow-up attack.

SID_回避・怒り1.name: Spurn 1
SID_回避・怒り1.description:
If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, reduces damage from
attacks during combat and from area-of-effect
Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect
Specials) by percentage = difference between
stats × 2 (max 20%). If unit's HP ≤ 25% and
unit's attack triggers Special, deals +5 damage
when Special triggers.

SID_回避・怒り2.name: Spurn 2
SID_回避・怒り2.description:
If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, reduces damage from
attacks during combat and from area-of-effect
Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect
Specials) by percentage = difference between
stats × 3 (max 30%). If unit's HP ≤ 50% and
unit's attack triggers Special, deals +5 damage
when Special triggers.

SID_回避・怒り3.name: Spurn 3
SID_回避・怒り3.description:
If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, reduces damage from
attacks during combat and from area-of-effect
Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect
Specials) by percentage = difference between
stats × 4 (max 40%). If unit's HP ≤ 75% and
unit's attack triggers Special, deals +5 damage
when Special triggers.

SID_死鎌ヘル.name: Hel's Reaper
SID_死鎌ヘル.description:
Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
Neutralizes "effective against flying" bonuses.
If foe does not use magic or staff, calculates
damage using foe's Res, and if unit’s HP > 1
and foe would reduce unit’s HP to 0, unit
survives with 1 HP. (Once per combat. Does not
stack.)

SID_死からは逃れられぬ.name: Inevitable Death
SID_死からは逃れられぬ.description:
Inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-4 on foes within
2 spaces during combat.

SID_笑面の斧.name: Sneering Axe
SID_笑面の斧.description:
$aInflicts penalty on foe's Atk/Spd/Def/Res
during combat = current bonus on each of foe's
stats × 2. (Example: if foe has +7 bonus to Atk,
inflicts Atk-14, for a net penalty of Atk-7.)
Calculates each stat penalty independently.
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts【Panic】
on target and foes within 2 spaces of target.

【Panic】
Converts bonuses on target into penalties
through its next action.

SID_セツナの緩弓.name: Setsuna's Yumi
SID_セツナの緩弓.description:
Effective against flying foes. If foe uses
bow, dagger, magic, or staff, grants
Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 during combat.

SID_魔道軍将の書.name: Tome of Order
SID_魔道軍将の書.description:
Effective against flying foes. Grants weapon-
triangle advantage against colorless foes, and
inflicts weapon-triangle disadvantage on
colorless foes during combat.

SID_風見鶏の槍.name: Flowing Lance
SID_風見鶏の槍.description:
If unit is not adjacent to an ally, inflicts
Atk/Def-5 on foe and neutralizes foe's
bonuses to Atk/Def (from skills like Fortify,
Rally, etc.) during combat.

SID_風見鶏の槍＋.name: Flowing Lance+
SID_風見鶏の槍＋.description:
If unit is not adjacent to an ally, inflicts
Atk/Def-5 on foe and neutralizes foe's
bonuses to Atk/Def (from skills like Fortify,
Rally, etc.) during combat.

SID_波閉ざす錨の斧.name: Gate-Anchor Axe
SID_波閉ざす錨の斧.description:
Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants
Def/Res+5 to unit and inflicts Def/Res-5 on foe
during combat and unit makes a guaranteed
follow-up attack.

SID_デッキブラシ.name: Deck Swabber
SID_デッキブラシ.description:
If unit is not adjacent to an ally, inflicts
Atk/Def-5 on foe and neutralizes foe's
bonuses to Atk/Def (from skills like Fortify,
Rally, etc.) during combat.

SID_デッキブラシ＋.name: Deck Swabber+
SID_デッキブラシ＋.description:
If unit is not adjacent to an ally, inflicts
Atk/Def-5 on foe and neutralizes foe's
bonuses to Atk/Def (from skills like Fortify,
Rally, etc.) during combat.

SID_舵の弓.name: Helm Bow
SID_舵の弓.description:
Effective against flying foes. If unit is not
adjacent to an ally, inflicts Spd/Def-5 on foe
and neutralizes foe's bonuses to Spd/Def (from
skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

SID_舵の弓＋.name: Helm Bow+
SID_舵の弓＋.description:
Effective against flying foes. If unit is not
adjacent to an ally, inflicts Spd/Def-5 on foe
and neutralizes foe's bonuses to Spd/Def (from
skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

SID_天空の海賊の嘴爪.name: Sky-Pirate Claw
SID_天空の海賊の嘴爪.description:
Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants Atk+5
to unit and inflicts Atk-5 on foe during combat
and unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack.

At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast
or dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any
ally, unit transforms (otherwise, unit reverts). If
unit transforms, unit can move 1 extra space.
(That turn only. Does not stack.) If unit
transforms, grants Atk+2.

SID_飛燕金剛の瞬撃3.name: Steady Impact
SID_飛燕金剛の瞬撃3.description:
If unit initiates combat, grants Spd+7,
Def+10 during combat and foe cannot
make a follow-up attack.

SID_攻撃守備の孤軍4.name: Atk/Def Solo 4
SID_攻撃守備の孤軍4.description:
If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants
Atk/Def+7 during combat.

SID_空からの急襲1.name: Dive-Bomb 1
SID_空からの急襲1.description:
At start of combat, if both unit's and foe's
HP = 100% and unit initiates combat, unit
can make a follow-up attack before foe
can counterattack.

SID_空からの急襲2.name: Dive-Bomb 2
SID_空からの急襲2.description:
At start of combat, if both unit's and foe's
HP ≥ 90% and unit initiates combat, unit
can make a follow-up attack before foe
can counterattack.

SID_空からの急襲3.name: Dive-Bomb 3
SID_空からの急襲3.description:
At start of combat, if both unit's and foe's
HP ≥ 80% and unit initiates combat, unit
can make a follow-up attack before foe
can counterattack.

SID_魔防の虚勢1.name: Phantom Res 1
SID_魔防の虚勢1.description:
If a skill compares unit's Res to a foe's or ally's
Res, treats unit's Res as if granted +5.

SID_魔防の虚勢2.name: Phantom Res 2
SID_魔防の虚勢2.description:
If a skill compares unit's Res to a foe's or ally's
Res, treats unit's Res as if granted +8.

SID_魔防の虚勢3.name: Phantom Res 3
SID_魔防の虚勢3.description:
If a skill compares unit's Res to a foe's or ally's
Res, treats unit's Res as if granted +10.

SID_蒼月グラディウス.name: Moon Gradivus
SID_蒼月グラディウス.description:
Unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range.
Grants Special cooldown charge +1 per foe's
attack during combat. (Only highest value
applied. Does not stack. Special cooldown
charge granted even if foe's attack deals
0 damage.)

SID_紅花オートクレール.name: Flower Hauteclere
SID_紅花オートクレール.description:
Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
At start of turn, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, unit can
move 1 extra space (that turn only; does not
stack) and grants the following status to unit
for 1 turn: "Unit can move to a space adjacent
to any ally within 2 spaces." At the start of
combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, inflicts Atk/Def-6
on foe during combat.

SID_翠風パルティア.name: Wind Parthia
SID_翠風パルティア.description:
Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
Effective against flying foes. If unit initiates
combat or if unit is within 2 spaces of an ally,
grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+5 during combat, and
if unit also deals damage to foe using a Special,
restores 50% of unit's maximum HP. (Triggers
even if 0 damage is dealt.)

SID_ダニエルの錬弓.name: Daniel-Made Bow
SID_ダニエルの錬弓.description:
Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
Effective against flying foes. Grants Atk+5 to
allies within 2 spaces during combat. Inflicts
Atk-5 on foes within 2 spaces during combat.

SID_ダークスパイクΤ.name: Dark Spikes T
SID_ダークスパイクΤ.description:
Effective against cavalry foes. Grants Spd+3.
At the start of combat, if foe's HP ≥ 75%,
grants Atk/Spd+6 during combat. If unit's HP
< 100% and unit initiates combat, unit makes
a guaranteed follow-up attack before foe
can counterattack.

SID_攻撃守備の連帯4.name: Atk/Def Unity
SID_攻撃守備の連帯4.description:
If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants
Atk/Def+5 and bonus to Atk/Def during
combat = current penalty on each of those
stats × 2. (Example: if unit has -7 penalty to
Atk, grants Atk+19, for a net bonus of Atk+12.)
Calculates each stat bonus independently.

SID_蒼き獅子王.name: Blue Lion Rule
SID_蒼き獅子王.description:
If unit's Def > foe's Def, reduces damage from
attacks during combat and from area-of-effect
Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect
Specials) by percentage = difference between
stats × 4 (max 40%), and also if foe initiates
combat, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up
attack.

SID_黒鷲の覇王.name: Black Eagle Rule
SID_黒鷲の覇王.description:
If unit's HP ≥ 25%, unit makes a guaranteed
follow-up attack, and also if foe initiates
combat, damage received by foe's follow-up
attack is also reduced by 80%. (For standard
weapons, "follow-up attack" means the second
strike. For weapons that grant "unit attacks
twice," it means the third and fourth strikes.)

SID_魔防の相互大紋章.name: Joint Drive Res
SID_魔防の相互大紋章.description:
Grants Res+4 to allies within 2 spaces during
combat. If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally,
grants Res+4 to unit during combat.

SID_攻撃速さの牽制1.name: Atk/Spd Rein 1
SID_攻撃速さの牽制1.description:
Inflicts Atk/Spd-2 on foes within 2 spaces
during combat.

SID_攻撃速さの牽制2.name: Atk/Spd Rein 2
SID_攻撃速さの牽制2.description:
Inflicts Atk/Spd-3 on foes within 2 spaces
during combat.

SID_攻撃速さの牽制3.name: Atk/Spd Rein 3
SID_攻撃速さの牽制3.description:
Inflicts Atk/Spd-4 on foes within 2 spaces
during combat.

SID_神祖竜のブレス.name: Primordial Breath
SID_神祖竜のブレス.description:
Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
If foe's Range = 2, calculates damage using the
lower of foe's Def or Res. If foe initiates combat
or if foe's HP = 100% at start of combat, grants
Atk/Spd/Def/Res+5 to unit and grants unit
Special cooldown charge +1 per unit's attack.
(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

SID_反竜穿.name: Negating Fang
SID_反竜穿.description:
Reduces damage from foe's attacks by 30%.
After triggering, boosts damage for unit's next
attack by 30% of unit's Atk. (Boost resets
at the end of combat.)

SID_高貴な燭台.name: Courtly Candle
SID_高貴な燭台.description:
At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50%, grants
Atk/Def+5 during combat, and also, if foe can
make a follow-up attack, reduces damage from
foe's first attack by 50%.

SID_高貴な燭台＋.name: Courtly Candle+
SID_高貴な燭台＋.description:
At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50%, grants
Atk/Def+5 during combat, and also, if foe can
make a follow-up attack, reduces damage from
foe's first attack by 50%.

SID_高貴な弓.name: Courtly Bow
SID_高貴な弓.description:
Effective against flying foes. At start of combat,
if unit's HP ≥ 50%, grants Atk/Def+5 during
combat, and also, if foe can make a follow-up
attack, reduces damage from foe's first attack
by 50%.

SID_高貴な弓＋.name: Courtly Bow+
SID_高貴な弓＋.description:
Effective against flying foes. At start of combat,
if unit's HP ≥ 50%, grants Atk/Def+5 during
combat, and also, if foe can make a follow-up
attack, reduces damage from foe's first attack
by 50%.

SID_高貴な扇.name: Courtly Fan
SID_高貴な扇.description:
$aIf unit initiates combat, grants Atk/Spd+5
during combat and neutralizes effects that
prevent unit's follow-up attacks during combat.
Effect:【Dagger ５】

【Dagger ５】
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-５ on target and foes within
2 spaces of target through their next actions.

SID_高貴な扇＋.name: Courtly Fan+
SID_高貴な扇＋.description:
$aIf unit initiates combat, grants Atk/Spd+5
during combat and neutralizes effects that
prevent unit's follow-up attacks during combat.
Effect:【Dagger ７】

【Dagger ７】
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-７ on target and foes within
2 spaces of target through their next actions.

SID_高貴な仮面.name: Courtly Mask
SID_高貴な仮面.description:
$aAt start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50%, grants
Atk/Res+5 during combat, and also, if foe can
make a follow-up attack, reduces damage from
foe's first attack by 50%.
Effect:【Dagger ５】

【Dagger ５】
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-５ on target and foes within
2 spaces of target through their next actions.

SID_高貴な仮面＋.name: Courtly Mask+
SID_高貴な仮面＋.description:
$aAt start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50%, grants
Atk/Res+5 during combat, and also, if foe can
make a follow-up attack, reduces damage from
foe's first attack by 50%.
Effect:【Dagger ７】

【Dagger ７】
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-７ on target and foes within
2 spaces of target through their next actions.

SID_黄金のゴブレット.name: Gilt Goblet
SID_黄金のゴブレット.description:
Grants Atk+3. If foe initiates combat or if foe's
HP = 100% at start of combat, grants
Atk/Res+6 during combat, and also, if foe uses
magic, reduces damage from attacks during
combat and from area-of-effect Specials by
50% (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect Specials).

SID_攻撃守備の絆4.name: Atk/Def Bond 4
SID_攻撃守備の絆4.description:
If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants
Atk/Def+7 to unit and neutralizes unit's
penalties to Atk/Def during combat.

SID_攻撃速さの防城戦1.name: AR-D Atk/Spd 1
SID_攻撃速さの防城戦1.description:
If defending in Aether Raids, grants Atk/Spd+X
during combat. (Calculates X based on number
of your defensive structures: ≥5 structures
grants +4; 4 grants +3; 3 grants +2; ≤2 grants
+1. Destroyed defensive structures are not
counted.)

SID_攻撃速さの防城戦2.name: AR-D Atk/Spd 2
SID_攻撃速さの防城戦2.description:
If defending in Aether Raids, grants Atk/Spd+X
during combat. (Calculates X based on number
of your defensive structures: ≥5 structures
grants +7; 4 grants +5; 3 grants +3; ≤2 grants
+1. Destroyed defensive structures are not
counted.)

SID_攻撃速さの防城戦3.name: AR-D Atk/Spd 3
SID_攻撃速さの防城戦3.description:
If defending in Aether Raids, grants Atk/Spd+X
during combat. (Calculates X based on number
of your defensive structures: ≥5 structures
grants +10; 4 grants +7; 3 grants +4; ≤2 grants
+1. Destroyed defensive structures are not
counted.)

SID_守備の魅了1.name: Def Cantrip 1
SID_守備の魅了1.description:
If Sing or Dance is used, inflicts Def-3 on
nearest foes within 4 spaces of unit through
their next actions.

SID_守備の魅了2.name: Def Cantrip 2
SID_守備の魅了2.description:
If Sing or Dance is used, inflicts Def-5 on
nearest foes within 4 spaces of unit through
their next actions.

SID_守備の魅了3.name: Def Cantrip 3
SID_守備の魅了3.description:
If Sing or Dance is used, inflicts Def-7 on
nearest foes within 4 spaces of unit through
their next actions.

SID_魔防の相互鼓舞.name: Joint Hone Res
SID_魔防の相互鼓舞.description:
At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to an ally,
grants Res+5 to unit and adjacent allies for
1 turn.

SID_フレイムランス.name: Flame Lance
SID_フレイムランス.description:
Effective against beast foes. Grants Spd+3.
At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50%,
calculates damage using foe's Res, and inflicts
Spd/Res-5 on foe during combat.

SID_士気旺盛の槍.name: Spirited Spear
SID_士気旺盛の槍.description:
$aIf【Bonus】is active on unit, grants
Atk/Def+4 and Special cooldown charge +1
per foe's attack during combat. (Only highest
value applied. Does not stack. Special
cooldown charge granted even if foe's attack
deals 0 damage.)

【Bonus】
All effects that last "for 1 turn" or "that turn
only." Includes bonuses granted by a skill
like Rally or Hone and positive status effects
(extra movement or effects like Dominance).

SID_士気旺盛の槍＋.name: Spirited Spear+
SID_士気旺盛の槍＋.description:
$aIf【Bonus】is active on unit, grants
Atk/Def+4 and Special cooldown charge +1
per foe's attack during combat. (Only highest
value applied. Does not stack. Special
cooldown charge granted even if foe's attack
deals 0 damage.)

【Bonus】
All effects that last "for 1 turn" or "that turn
only." Includes bonuses granted by a skill
like Rally or Hone and positive status effects
(extra movement or effects like Dominance).

SID_ダルレカの激斧.name: Talregan Axe
SID_ダルレカの激斧.description:
Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
If unit initiates combat or if unit is within 2
spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Spd+6 during
combat. If unit initiates combat, unit can make a
follow-up attack before foe can counterattack.

SID_バルフレチェ.name: Double Bow
SID_バルフレチェ.description:
Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
Effective against flying foes. If unit is not
adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+5
during combat and unit can counterattack
regardless of foe's range.

SID_ブラーフォックス.name: Blárfox
SID_ブラーフォックス.description:
If unit initiates combat, inflicts
Atk/Spd/Def/Res-4 on foe
during combat.

SID_ブラーフォックス＋.name: Blárfox+
SID_ブラーフォックス＋.description:
If unit initiates combat, inflicts
Atk/Spd/Def/Res-4 on foe
during combat.

SID_狙撃.name: Deadeye
SID_狙撃.description:
Doubles damage dealt. Disables non-Special
skills that "reduce damage by X%."

SID_抑止隊形1.name: Crafty Fighter 1
SID_抑止隊形1.description:
If unit's HP ≥ 75% and foe initiates combat,
unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack
and inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on
foe per attack. (Only highest value applied.
Does not stack.)

SID_抑止隊形2.name: Crafty Fighter 2
SID_抑止隊形2.description:
If unit's HP ≥ 50% and foe initiates combat,
unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack
and inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on
foe per attack. (Only highest value applied.
Does not stack.)

SID_抑止隊形3.name: Crafty Fighter 3
SID_抑止隊形3.description:
If unit's HP ≥ 25% and foe initiates combat,
unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack
and inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on
foe per attack. (Only highest value applied.
Does not stack.)

SID_速さ守備の牽制1.name: Spd/Def Rein 1
SID_速さ守備の牽制1.description:
Inflicts Spd/Def-2 on foes within 2 spaces
during combat.

SID_速さ守備の牽制2.name: Spd/Def Rein 2
SID_速さ守備の牽制2.description:
Inflicts Spd/Def-3 on foes within 2 spaces
during combat.

SID_速さ守備の牽制3.name: Spd/Def Rein 3
SID_速さ守備の牽制3.description:
Inflicts Spd/Def-4 on foes within 2 spaces
during combat.

SID_攻撃魔防の牽制1.name: Atk/Res Rein 1
SID_攻撃魔防の牽制1.description:
Inflicts Atk/Res-2 on foes within 2 spaces
during combat.

SID_攻撃魔防の牽制2.name: Atk/Res Rein 2
SID_攻撃魔防の牽制2.description:
Inflicts Atk/Res-3 on foes within 2 spaces
during combat.

SID_攻撃魔防の牽制3.name: Atk/Res Rein 3
SID_攻撃魔防の牽制3.description:
Inflicts Atk/Res-4 on foes within 2 spaces
during combat.

SID_エルフィの大槍.name: Effie's Lance
SID_エルフィの大槍.description:
At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50%, grants
Atk+6 during combat.

SID_執念の呪.name: Obsessive Curse
SID_執念の呪.description:
Effective against cavalry foes. Inflicts Spd/Res-5
on foes within 2 spaces during combat.

SID_変身のカード.name: Jokers Wild
SID_変身のカード.description:
Grants HP+5. Unit's Atk/Spd/Def/Res =
highest respective stat from among allies
within 2 spaces during combat. (Calculates
each stat bonus independently at start of
combat. If unit's stat is highest, unit's stat
will decrease.)

SID_蒼紅のブレス.name: Frostfire Breath
SID_蒼紅のブレス.description:
$aEffective against dragon foes. Grants Atk+3.
If【Bonus】is active on unit, grants Atk/Spd+6
during combat, and also grants bonus to unit's
Atk = total bonuses on unit's Def and Res × 1.5
during combat. If foe's Range = 2, calculates
damage using the lower of foe's Def or Res.

【Bonus】
All effects that last "for 1 turn" or "that turn
only." Includes bonuses granted by a skill
like Rally or Hone and positive status effects
(extra movement or effects like Dominance).

SID_暁闇のブレス.name: Moonless Breath
SID_暁闇のブレス.description:
Unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range.
If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally and deals
damage to foe using a Special, restores 30% of
unit's maximum HP. (Triggers even if 0 damage
is dealt.) If foe's Range = 2, calculates damage
using the lower of foe's Def or Res.

SID_黒夜のブレス.name: Blackfire Breath
SID_黒夜のブレス.description:
If unit is not adjacent to an ally, inflicts
Atk/Res-5 on foe during combat and
neutralizes foe's bonuses to Atk/Res (from
skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.
If foe's Range = 2, calculates damage using
the lower of foe's Def or Res.

SID_黒夜のブレス＋.name: Blackfire Breath+
SID_黒夜のブレス＋.description:
If unit is not adjacent to an ally, inflicts
Atk/Res-5 on foe during combat and
neutralizes foe's bonuses to Atk/Res (from
skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.
If foe's Range = 2, calculates damage using
the lower of foe's Def or Res.

SID_仄明のブレス.name: Pale Breath
SID_仄明のブレス.description:
If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants
Atk/Def+5 to unit and neutralizes unit's
penalties to Atk/Def during combat. If foe's
Range = 2, calculates damage using the
lower of foe's Def or Res.

SID_仄明のブレス＋.name: Pale Breath+
SID_仄明のブレス＋.description:
If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants
Atk/Def+5 to unit and neutralizes unit's
penalties to Atk/Def during combat. If foe's
Range = 2, calculates damage using the
lower of foe's Def or Res.

SID_速さの大応援.name: Rally Up Spd
SID_速さの大応援.description:
Grants Spd+4 to target ally and allies within
2 spaces of target (excluding unit) for 1 turn.

SID_速さの大応援＋.name: Rally Up Spd+
SID_速さの大応援＋.description:
Grants Spd+6 to target ally and allies within
2 spaces of target (excluding unit) for 1 turn.

SID_邪竜の大鱗.name: Dragonscale
SID_邪竜の大鱗.description:
Neutralizes "effective against flying" bonuses.
If foe initiates combat or if foe's HP = 100%
at start of combat, inflicts Atk/Res-6 on foe
and grants Special cooldown charge +1 per
foe's attack during combat. (Only highest
value applied. Does not stack. Special
cooldown charge granted even if foe’s attack
deals 0 damage.)

SID_攻撃魔防の密集1.name: Atk/Res Form 1
SID_攻撃魔防の密集1.description:
If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants
Atk/Res+X to unit during combat (X = number
of allies within 2 spaces; max 3).

SID_攻撃魔防の密集2.name: Atk/Res Form 2
SID_攻撃魔防の密集2.description:
If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants
Atk/Res+X to unit during combat (X = number
of allies within 2 spaces + 2; max 5).

SID_攻撃魔防の密集3.name: Atk/Res Form 3
SID_攻撃魔防の密集3.description:
If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants
Atk/Res+X to unit during combat (X = 2 ×
number of allies within 2 spaces, + 1; max 7).

SID_竜の逆鱗1.name: Dragon's Ire 1
SID_竜の逆鱗1.description:
If unit's HP = 100% and foe initiates combat,
neutralizes effects that prevent unit's follow-up
attacks and unit makes a guaranteed follow-up
attack.

SID_竜の逆鱗2.name: Dragon's Ire 2
SID_竜の逆鱗2.description:
If unit's HP ≥ 75% and foe initiates combat,
neutralizes effects that prevent unit's follow-up
attacks and unit makes a guaranteed follow-up
attack.

SID_竜の逆鱗3.name: Dragon's Ire 3
SID_竜の逆鱗3.description:
If unit's HP ≥ 50% and foe initiates combat,
neutralizes effects that prevent unit's follow-up
attacks and unit makes a guaranteed follow-up
attack.

SID_正面隊形・自己1.name: Slick Fighter 1
SID_正面隊形・自己1.description:
If unit's HP ≥ 75% and foe initiates combat,
neutralizes penalties on unit during combat and
unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack.

SID_正面隊形・自己2.name: Slick Fighter 2
SID_正面隊形・自己2.description:
If unit's HP ≥ 50% and foe initiates combat,
neutralizes penalties on unit during combat and
unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack.

SID_正面隊形・自己3.name: Slick Fighter 3
SID_正面隊形・自己3.description:
If unit's HP ≥ 25% and foe initiates combat,
neutralizes penalties on unit during combat and
unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack.

SID_雷霆.name: Thunderbrand
SID_雷霆.description:
Grants Spd+3. At start of combat, if foe's
HP ≥ 50%, grants Atk/Spd+5 during combat,
neutralizes effects that prevent unit's follow-up
attacks during combat, and also, if unit initiates
combat, unit can make a follow-up attack
before foe can counterattack.

SID_天帝の闇剣.name: Dark Creator S
SID_天帝の闇剣.description:
Grants Def+3. During combat, boosts unit's
Atk/Def by number of allies with HP ≥ 90% × 2
(max 6). During unit's first combat in player
phase or enemy phase, reduces damage from
attacks during combat and from area-of-effect
Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect
Specials) by percentage = number of allies
with HP ≥ 90% × 15 (max 45%).

SID_アッサルの槍.name: Spear of Assal
SID_アッサルの槍.description:
Grants Spd+3. If unit is within 2 spaces of an
ally, grants Atk/Spd+4 to unit during combat
and neutralizes foe's bonuses to Atk/Spd (from
skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.
Grants Atk/Spd+4 to allies within 2 spaces
during combat.

SID_生存本能の弓.name: Survivalist Bow
SID_生存本能の弓.description:
Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
Effective against flying foes. If unit is not
adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Spd+6 during
combat, and also, if foe's HP ≥ 80% at start
of combat, foe cannot counterattack.

SID_カドゥケウスの杖.name: Caduceus Staff
SID_カドゥケウスの杖.description:
Calculates damage from staff like other weapons.
Reduces damage from foes' attacks during
combat to allies within 2 spaces by 30%.

SID_レスキュー.name: Rescue
SID_レスキュー.description:
Restores 8 HP to target ally. Unit moves
1 space away from target ally. Ally moves
to unit's previous space.

If unit or ally cannot move to the target space
(if another ally or foe is occupying the space),
unit and ally will not move. Using this skill has
no effect on Special cooldown charge and unit
does not gain EXP or SP. (This skill is treated
as a movement skill only when movement
takes place.)

SID_レスキュー＋.name: Rescue+
SID_レスキュー＋.description:
Restores HP = 50% of unit's Atk (min 8 HP)
to target ally. Unit moves 1 space away from
target ally. Ally moves to unit's previous space.

If unit or ally cannot move to the target space
(if another ally or foe is occupying the space),
unit and ally will not move. Using this skill has
no effect on Special cooldown charge and unit
does not gain EXP or SP. (This skill is treated
as a movement skill only when movement
takes place.)

SID_疾風静水の祝福.name: Deluge Balm
SID_疾風静水の祝福.description:
When healing an ally with a staff, grants
Spd/Res+4 to all allies for 1 turn.

SID_疾風静水の祝福＋.name: Deluge Balm+
SID_疾風静水の祝福＋.description:
When healing an ally with a staff, grants
Spd/Res+6 to all allies for 1 turn.

SID_攻撃速さの奮起1.name: Rouse Atk/Spd 1
SID_攻撃速さの奮起1.description:
At start of turn, if unit is not adjacent to an ally,
grants Atk/Spd+2 to unit for 1 turn.

SID_攻撃速さの奮起2.name: Rouse Atk/Spd 2
SID_攻撃速さの奮起2.description:
At start of turn, if unit is not adjacent to an ally,
grants Atk/Spd+4 to unit for 1 turn.

SID_攻撃速さの奮起3.name: Rouse Atk/Spd 3
SID_攻撃速さの奮起3.description:
At start of turn, if unit is not adjacent to an ally,
grants Atk/Spd+6 to unit for 1 turn.

SID_アラドヴァル.name: Areadbhar
SID_アラドヴァル.description:
Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, grants
Atk/Spd/Def/Res+5 during combat, and also,
if unit's Spd > foe's Spd, reduces damage from
attacks during combat and from area-of-effect
Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect
Specials) by percentage = difference between
stats × 4 (max 40%).

(If area-of-effect Special triggers outside
of combat, checks stats and conditions for
damage reduction at time of trigger and again
at start of combat.)

SID_無惨.name: Atrocity
SID_無惨.description:
At start of combat, if foe's HP ≥ 50%, boosts
damage by 25% of unit's Atk, and after
combat, inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-5 and Special
cooldown count+1 on target and foes within
2 spaces of target through their next actions.
(No effect on Special cooldown counts already
at maximum.)

SID_迅雷風烈・奇数1.name: Odd Tempest 1
SID_迅雷風烈・奇数1.description:
At start of odd-numbered turns, if unit's
HP = 100%, unit can move 1 extra space.
(That turn only. Does not stack.)

SID_迅雷風烈・奇数2.name: Odd Tempest 2
SID_迅雷風烈・奇数2.description:
At start of odd-numbered turns, if unit's
HP ≥ 50%, unit can move 1 extra space.
(That turn only. Does not stack.)

SID_迅雷風烈・奇数3.name: Odd Tempest 3
SID_迅雷風烈・奇数3.description:
At start of odd-numbered turns, unit can
move 1 extra space. (That turn only. Does
not stack.)

SID_エリーゼの幼杖.name: Elise's Staff
SID_エリーゼの幼杖.description:
$aGrants Spd+3. Calculates damage from staff
like other weapons. After combat, if unit
attacked, inflicts【Gravity】on target and foes
within 1 space of target.

【Gravity】
Restricts target's movement to 1 space through
its next action.

SID_悠久のブレス.name: Eternal Breath
SID_悠久のブレス.description:
At start of turn, if an ally is within 2 spaces
of unit, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+5 to unit and
allies within 2 spaces for 1 turn. If foe's
Range = 2, calculates damage using the
lower of foe's Def or Res.

SID_忍の刀.name: Ninja Katana
SID_忍の刀.description:
Grants Spd+4. Inflicts Def/Res-4. If unit initiates
combat, unit attacks twice.

SID_忍の刀＋.name: Ninja Katana+
SID_忍の刀＋.description:
Grants Spd+4. Inflicts Def/Res-4. If unit initiates
combat, unit attacks twice.

SID_忍の槍.name: Ninja Yari
SID_忍の槍.description:
Grants Spd+4. Inflicts Def/Res-4. If unit initiates
combat, unit attacks twice.

SID_忍の槍＋.name: Ninja Yari+
SID_忍の槍＋.description:
Grants Spd+4. Inflicts Def/Res-4. If unit initiates
combat, unit attacks twice.

SID_忍の斧.name: Ninja Masakari
SID_忍の斧.description:
Grants Spd+4. Inflicts Def/Res-4. If unit initiates
combat, unit attacks twice.

SID_忍の斧＋.name: Ninja Masakari+
SID_忍の斧＋.description:
Grants Spd+4. Inflicts Def/Res-4. If unit initiates
combat, unit attacks twice.

SID_業火の双斧.name: Twin Star Axe
SID_業火の双斧.description:
Inflicts Spd-5. Unit attacks twice. (Even if foe
initiates combat, unit attacks twice.) Grants
bonus to unit's Atk = half of total bonuses on
unit during combat.

SID_疾風の双手裏剣.name: Tailwind Shuriken
SID_疾風の双手裏剣.description:
$aAccelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
Grants Spd+4. Inflicts Def/Res-4. If unit initiates
combat, unit attacks twice.
Effect:【Dagger ７】

【Dagger ７】
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-７ on target and foes within
2 spaces of target through their next actions.

SID_攻撃守備の封印1.name: Chill Atk/Def 1
SID_攻撃守備の封印1.description:
At start of turn, inflicts Atk/Def-3 on foe on
the enemy team with the highest Atk+Def total
through its next action.

SID_攻撃守備の封印2.name: Chill Atk/Def 2
SID_攻撃守備の封印2.description:
At start of turn, inflicts Atk/Def-5 on foe on
the enemy team with the highest Atk+Def total
through its next action.

SID_攻撃守備の牽制1.name: Atk/Def Rein 1
SID_攻撃守備の牽制1.description:
Inflicts Atk/Def-2 on foes within 2 spaces
during combat.

SID_攻撃守備の牽制2.name: Atk/Def Rein 2
SID_攻撃守備の牽制2.description:
Inflicts Atk/Def-3 on foes within 2 spaces
during combat.

SID_攻撃守備の牽制3.name: Atk/Def Rein 3
SID_攻撃守備の牽制3.description:
Inflicts Atk/Def-4 on foes within 2 spaces
during combat.

SID_速さ守備の大開放1.name: Spd/Def Gap 1
SID_速さ守備の大開放1.description:
At start of turn, grants Spd/Def+1 to ally
with the highest Spd+Def total for 1 turn.
(Excludes unit.)

SID_速さ守備の大開放2.name: Spd/Def Gap 2
SID_速さ守備の大開放2.description:
At start of turn, grants Spd/Def+3 to ally
with the highest Spd+Def total for 1 turn.
(Excludes unit.)

SID_速さ守備の大開放3.name: Spd/Def Gap 3
SID_速さ守備の大開放3.description:
At start of turn, grants Spd/Def+5 to ally
with the highest Spd+Def total for 1 turn.
(Excludes unit.)

SID_瞬撃の槍.name: Instant Lance
SID_瞬撃の槍.description:
If unit initiates combat, grants Atk/Def+4
during combat and foe cannot make a
follow-up attack.

SID_瞬撃の槍＋.name: Instant Lance+
SID_瞬撃の槍＋.description:
If unit initiates combat, grants Atk/Def+4
during combat and foe cannot make a
follow-up attack.

SID_虎の剛斧.name: Tiger-Roar Axe
SID_虎の剛斧.description:
Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
If unit initiates combat or if unit is within 2
spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+5
during combat, and also, at start of combat,
if foe's HP = 100%, unit makes a guaranteed
follow-up attack.

SID_アーリアル.name: Aureola
SID_アーリアル.description:
Effective against magic foes. Grants Res+3.
If unit initiates combat or if unit is within 2
spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Spd/Res+5 and
disables foe's skills that "calculate damage
using the lower of foe's Def or Res" during
combat. Restores 7 HP to unit and allies within
2 spaces after combat.

SID_近距離防御4.name: Close Def 4
SID_近距離防御4.description:
If foe initiates combat and uses sword, lance,
axe, dragonstone, or beast damage, grants
Def/Res+8 and neutralizes foe's bonuses (from
skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

SID_飛竜行空1.name: Wyvern Flight 1
SID_飛竜行空1.description:
At start of combat, if unit's Spd ≥ foe's Spd-10,
inflicts penalty on foe's Atk/Def during combat
= 30% of difference between Def stats
(unit's Def minus foe's Def) before combat.
(Maximum penalty of -3.)

SID_飛竜行空2.name: Wyvern Flight 2
SID_飛竜行空2.description:
At start of combat, if unit's Spd ≥ foe's Spd-10,
inflicts penalty on foe's Atk/Def during combat
= 40% of difference between Def stats
(unit’s Def minus foe's Def) before combat.
(Maximum penalty of -5.)

SID_飛竜行空3.name: Wyvern Flight 3
SID_飛竜行空3.description:
At start of combat, if unit's Spd ≥ foe's Spd-10,
inflicts penalty on foe's Atk/Def during combat
= 50% of difference between Def stats
(unit’s Def minus foe's Def) before combat.
(Maximum penalty of -7.)

SID_束縛の首飾り.name: Binding Necklace
SID_束縛の首飾り.description:
If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants
Atk/Spd/Def/Res+2 to unit and inflicts
Atk/Spd/Def/Res-2 on foe during combat,
and also, if foe has bonuses, grants bonus
to unit's Atk/Spd/Def/Res and inflicts penalty
on foe's Atk/Spd/Def/Res during combat =
current bonus on each of foe's stats.
Calculates each stat bonus independently.

SID_速さ魔防の牽制1.name: Spd/Res Rein 1
SID_速さ魔防の牽制1.description:

SID_速さ魔防の牽制2.name: Spd/Res Rein 2

SID_速さ魔防の牽制3.name: Spd/Res Rein 3

SID_花嫁の護刀＋_ATK.name: Pledged Blade+ (+Mt)
SID_花嫁の護刀＋_ATK.description:
$aIf【Bonus】is active on unit, grants
Atk/Def+4 and Special cooldown charge +1
per foe's attack during combat. (Only highest
value applied. Does not stack. Special
cooldown charge granted even if foe's attack
deals 0 damage.)

【Bonus】
All effects that last "for 1 turn" or "that turn
only." Includes bonuses granted by a skill
like Rally or Hone and positive status effects
(extra movement or effects like Dominance).

SID_笑面の斧_ATK.name: Sneering Axe (+Mt)
SID_笑面の斧_ATK.description:
$aInflicts penalty on foe's Atk/Spd/Def/Res
during combat = current bonus on each of foe's
stats × 2. (Example: if foe has +7 bonus to Atk,
inflicts Atk-14, for a net penalty of Atk-7.)

on target and foes within 2 spaces of target.

Converts bonuses on target into penalties
through its next action.

its next action.

SID_寵愛の書.description:

Atk/Res+5 to unit during combat and restores

SID_エルナの杖.name: Elena's Staff
SID_エルナの杖.description:
Grants Res+3. Foe cannot counterattack.
At start of turn, inflicts Atk/Spd-7 on nearest
foes within 4 spaces through their next actions.
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts Atk/Spd-7
on target and foes within 2 spaces of target
through their next actions.

SID_天真のブレス.name: Purifying Breath
SID_天真のブレス.description:
Slows Special trigger (cooldown count+1).
Unit can counterattack regardless of foe's
range. If foe's Range = 2, calculates damage
using the lower of foe's Def or Res.

SID_リュングヘイズ.name: Lyngheiðr
SID_リュングヘイズ.description:
$aGrants Spd+3. Enables【Canto (３)】during turns
1 through 4. If unit initiates combat, grants
Atk/Spd+6 during combat and reduces damage
from foe's first attack by 30%.

【Canto (３)】
After an attack, Assist skill, or structure
destruction, unit can move ３ space(s).

(Unit moves according to movement type. Once
per turn. Cannot attack or assist. Only highest
value applied. Does not stack. After moving,
if a skill that grants another action would be
triggered (like with Galeforce), Canto will
trigger again. Unit's base movement has no
effect on movement granted. Cannot warp
(using skills like Wings of Mercy) a distance
greater than ３ space(s).)

SID_黒曜の槍.name: Obsidian Lance
SID_黒曜の槍.description:
Grants Def+3. If unit is not adjacent to an ally,
inflicts Atk/Def-6 on foe during combat and
unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack.

SID_ロヴンヘイズ.name: Lofnheiðr
SID_ロヴンヘイズ.description:
$aGrants Atk+3. Enables【Canto (３)】during turns
1 through 4. If unit initiates combat or is within
2 spaces of an ally, grants Atk+6 to unit during
combat, inflicts Atk-6 on foe during combat,
and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

【Canto (３)】
After an attack, Assist skill, or structure
destruction, unit can move ３ space(s).

(Unit moves according to movement type. Once
per turn. Cannot attack or assist. Only highest
value applied. Does not stack. After moving,
if a skill that grants another action would be
triggered (like with Galeforce), Canto will
trigger again. Unit's base movement has no
effect on movement granted. Cannot warp
(using skills like Wings of Mercy) a distance
greater than ３ space(s).)

SID_反攻の斧.description:

combat.

SID_反攻の斧＋.name: Reprisal Axe+

combat.

SID_魔弾.description:

Def or Res.

【Guard】

per attack during combat through its next action.
(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

SID_攻撃魔防の連帯4.name: Atk/Res Unity
SID_攻撃魔防の連帯4.description:
If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants
Atk/Res+5 and bonus to Atk/Res during
combat = current penalty on each of those
stats × 2. (Example: if unit has -7 penalty to
Atk, grants Atk+19, for a net bonus of Atk+12.)
Calculates each stat bonus independently.

SID_追撃隊形・偶数1.name: Even Follow-Up 1
SID_追撃隊形・偶数1.description:
If it is an even-numbered turn and unit's HP =
100%, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up
attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

SID_追撃隊形・偶数2.name: Even Follow-Up 2
SID_追撃隊形・偶数2.description:

50%, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack
and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

SID_追撃隊形・偶数3.name: Even Follow-Up 3
SID_追撃隊形・偶数3.description:

guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot
make a follow-up attack.

SID_快癒・奇数1.name: Odd Recovery 1
SID_快癒・奇数1.description:
$aAt start of odd-numbered turns, neutralizes
any【Penalty】on allies within 2 spaces of unit
and restores 5 HP to those units.

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next
action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill
like Panic or Threaten and negative status
effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting
movement, or the effects of a skill like
Triangle Adept or Guard).

At the start of turn 1, grants Special cooldown
count-1 to unit. At start of combat, if unit's
HP ≥ 25%, grants Atk/Res+6 during combat
and disables unit's and foe's skills that change
attack priority.

SID_天与の魔道.name: Gifted Magic
SID_天与の魔道.description:
Before combat this unit initiates, foes
in an area near target take damage equal
to 0.8 × (unit's Atk minus foe's Def or Res).

SID_甘い初夢の弓.name: First-Dream Bow
SID_甘い初夢の弓.description:
Effective against flying foes. Grants Res+3.
Grants Atk+4 to allies within 3 spaces during
combat. Inflicts Atk-4 on any foe within
3 spaces during combat.

SID_妖精姉妹の絆.name: Bond of the Álfar
SID_妖精姉妹の絆.description:
Grants Spd+3. Grants Atk+6 to any ally
in cardinal directions of unit during
that ally's combat.

SID_賀正の人狼王の爪牙.name: Resolved Fang
SID_賀正の人狼王の爪牙.description:
Grants Def+3. At start of combat, if foe's
HP ≥ 75%, grants Def+5 to unit, inflicts Def-5
on foe during combat, and then, if unit's
Def > foe's Def, deals damage = 70% of
difference between stats. (Maximum bonus
of +7 damage.)

At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast
or dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any
ally, unit transforms (otherwise, unit reverts).
If unit transforms, grants Atk+2 and deals +10
damage when Special triggers.

SID_賀正の人狼娘の爪牙.name: Renewed Fang
SID_賀正の人狼娘の爪牙.description:
Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
If unit is within 2 spaces of support partner,
inflicts Atk/Spd-6 on foe and grants Special
cooldown charge +1 to unit per attack during
combat. (Only highest value applied. Does not
stack.) Grants Special cooldown charge +1 per
attack to support partners within 2 spaces.
(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast
or dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any
ally, unit transforms (otherwise, unit reverts).
If unit transforms, grants Atk+2 and deals +10
damage when Special triggers.

SID_賀正の妖狐王の爪牙.name: Refreshed Fang
SID_賀正の妖狐王の爪牙.description:
Grants Spd+3. At start of combat, if foe's
HP ≥ 75%, grants Spd+5 to unit, inflicts Spd-5
on foe during combat, and then, if unit's
Spd > foe's Spd, deals damage = 70% of
difference between stats. (Maximum bonus
of +7 damage. Combos with Phantom Spd.)

At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast
or dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any
ally, unit transforms (otherwise, unit reverts).
If unit transforms, grants Atk+2, and also,
if unit initiates combat, inflicts Atk/Def-4
on foe during combat and foe cannot make
a follow-up attack.

SID_明鏡の反撃・近距離.name: Close Ward
SID_明鏡の反撃・近距離.description:
If magic, staff, or dragonstone foe initiates
combat, unit can counterattack regardless of
foe's range, disables foe's skills that "calculate
damage using the lower of foe's Def or Res,"
and grants Atk/Res+5 to unit during combat.

SID_魔防の魅了1.name: Res Cantrip 1
SID_魔防の魅了1.description:
If Sing or Dance is used, inflicts Res-3 on
nearest foes within 4 spaces of unit through
their next actions.

SID_魔防の魅了2.name: Res Cantrip 2
SID_魔防の魅了2.description:
If Sing or Dance is used, inflicts Res-5 on
nearest foes within 4 spaces of unit through
their next actions.

SID_魔防の魅了3.name: Res Cantrip 3
SID_魔防の魅了3.description:
If Sing or Dance is used, inflicts Res-7 on
nearest foes within 4 spaces of unit through
their next actions.

SID_攻撃守備の干渉1.name: Atk/Def Snag 1
SID_攻撃守備の干渉1.description:
If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition,
Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets
unit, inflicts Atk/Def-2 on nearest foes within
4 spaces of both unit and target through their
next actions.

SID_攻撃守備の干渉2.name: Atk/Def Snag 2
SID_攻撃守備の干渉2.description:
If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition,
Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets
unit, inflicts Atk/Def-4 on nearest foes within
4 spaces of both unit and target through their
next actions.

SID_攻撃守備の干渉3.name: Atk/Def Snag 3
SID_攻撃守備の干渉3.description:
If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition,
Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets
unit, inflicts Atk/Def-6 on nearest foes within
4 spaces of both unit and target through their
next actions.

SID_アーダンの固剣.name: Arden's Blade
SID_アーダンの固剣.description:
Inflicts Spd-5. Unit attacks twice. (Even if foe
initiates combat, unit attacks twice.)

SID_春陽の杖.name: Springtime Staff
SID_春陽の杖.description:
$aGrants Atk+3. Foe cannot counterattack. After
combat, if unit attacked, inflicts【Gravity】on
target and foes within 1 space of target.

【Gravity】
Restricts target's movement to 1 space through
its next action.

SID_フレイズマル.name: Hreiðmarr
SID_フレイズマル.description:
$aGrants Def+3. Enables【Canto (３)】during turns
1 through 4. If unit is not adjacent to an ally,
grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+5 during combat,
inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe
per attack during combat (only highest value
applied; does not stack), and after combat, if
unit attacked, inflicts【Guard】on target and
foes within 2 spaces of target.

【Canto (３)】
After an attack, Assist skill, or structure
destruction, unit can move ３ space(s).

(Unit moves according to movement type. Once
per turn. Cannot attack or assist. Only highest
value applied. Does not stack. After moving,
if a skill that grants another action would be
triggered (like with Galeforce), Canto will
trigger again. Unit's base movement has no
effect on movement granted. Cannot warp
(using skills like Wings of Mercy) a distance
greater than ３ space(s).)

【Guard】
Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target
per attack during combat through its next action.
(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

SID_義憤の強弓.name: Indignant Bow
SID_義憤の強弓.description:
Effective against flying foes. Grants Res+3.
If foe initiates combat or if foe's HP = 100%
at start of combat, grants Atk+6 to unit and
inflicts Atk-6 on foe during combat, and also
neutralizes penalties to unit's Atk and bonuses
to foe's Atk (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.)
during combat.

SID_ストーン.name: Petrify
SID_ストーン.description:
$aGrants Res+3. At start of turns 1 through 5,
inflicts Atk/Spd-7 and【Gravity】on foe on the
enemy team with the lowest specified stat
(see below).

(Specified stats: Turn 1 = HP, Turn 2 = Atk,
Turn 3 = Spd, Turn 4 = Def, Turn 5 = Res.)

【Gravity】
Restricts target's movement to 1 space through
its next action.

SID_グラフカリバー.name: Grafcalibur
SID_グラフカリバー.description:
Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
Effective against flying foes. If unit initiates
combat or if unit is within 2 spaces of an ally,
grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+5 and neutralizes foe's
bonuses (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.)
during combat.

SID_キアの杖.name: Kia Staff
SID_キアの杖.description:
$aCalculates damage from staff like other weapons.
At start of turn, if【Penalty】is active on any allies
within 4 spaces of unit (excluding unit), grants
Atk/Spd+6 to ally with the lowest HP among
them for 1 turn and neutralizes any【Penalty】on
that ally. (If【Penalty】is not active on
any ally within 4 spaces of unit, targets ally with
the lowest HP among them instead.)

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next
action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill
like Panic or Threaten and negative status
effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting
movement, or the effects of a skill like
Triangle Adept or Guard).

SID_リターン.name: Return
SID_リターン.description:
Restores 8 HP to target ally and target ally
moves to opposite side of unit.

If ally cannot move to the target space
(if another ally or foe is occupying the space),
ally will not move. Using this skill has no effect
on Special cooldown charge and unit does not
gain EXP or SP. (This skill is treated as a
movement skill only when movement
takes place.)

SID_リターン＋.name: Return+
SID_リターン＋.description:
Restores HP = 50% of unit's Atk (min 8 HP)
to target ally and target ally moves to opposite
side of unit.

If ally cannot move to the target space
(if another ally or foe is occupying the space),
ally will not move. Using this skill has no effect
on Special cooldown charge and unit does not
gain EXP or SP. (This skill is treated as a
movement skill only when movement
takes place.)

SID_飛燕明鏡の構え3.name: Swift Stance 3
SID_飛燕明鏡の構え3.description:
If foe initiates combat, grants Spd/Res+6 to unit
during combat and inflicts Special cooldown
charge -1 on foe per attack. (Only highest value
applied. Does not stack.)

SID_攻撃魔防封じ1.name: Seal Atk/Res 1
SID_攻撃魔防封じ1.description:
Inflicts Atk/Res-3 on foe through its next action
after combat.

SID_攻撃魔防封じ2.name: Seal Atk/Res 2
SID_攻撃魔防封じ2.description:
Inflicts Atk/Res-5 on foe through its next action
after combat.

SID_速さ魔防の信義1.name: Spd/Res Oath 1
SID_速さ魔防の信義1.description:
At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to an ally,
grants Spd/Res+3 to unit for 1 turn.

SID_速さ魔防の信義2.name: Spd/Res Oath 2
SID_速さ魔防の信義2.description:
At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to an ally,
grants Spd/Res+4 to unit for 1 turn.

SID_速さ魔防の信義3.name: Spd/Res Oath 3
SID_速さ魔防の信義3.description:
At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to an ally,
grants Spd/Res+5 to unit for 1 turn.

SID_アーダンの固剣_ATK.description:

SID_戦姫の和弓_ATK.name: Warrior Princess (+Mt)
SID_戦姫の和弓_ATK.description:
Effective against flying and armored foes.
Grants Spd+3. Grants Atk/Spd+4 to allies
within 2 spaces during combat. If unit is
within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Spd+4
to unit during combat.

SID_戦姫の和弓_AGI.name: Warrior Princess (+Spd)
SID_戦姫の和弓_AGI.description:

to unit during combat.

SID_戦姫の和弓_牽.description:

SID_フォルセティ_ATK.name: Forseti (+Mt)
SID_フォルセティ_ATK.description:
Grants Spd+3. If unit's HP ≥ 25% and unit
initiates combat, grants Atk/Spd+4 during
combat and unit can make a follow-up
attack before foe can counterattack.

SID_フォルセティ_AGI.name: Forseti (+Spd)
SID_フォルセティ_AGI.description:
Grants Spd+3. If unit's HP ≥ 25% and unit

attack before foe can counterattack.

SID_フォルセティ_DEF.name: Forseti (+Def)

SID_春陽の杖_回.name: Springtime Staff (Eff)
SID_春陽の杖_回.description:
$aGrants Atk+3. Foe cannot counterattack. After
combat, if unit attacked, inflicts【Gravity】on
target and foes within 1 space of target.

【Gravity】
Restricts target's movement to 1 space through
its next action.

SID_ペレジアの斧.name: Plegian Axe
SID_ペレジアの斧.description:
If unit is not adjacent to an ally, inflicts penalty
on foe's Atk/Def during combat = 5 + any
current penalty on each of those stats.
(Example: if foe has -7 penalty to Atk, inflicts
Atk-12, for a net penalty of Atk-19 during
combat.) Calculates each stat penalty
independently.

SID_ペレジアの斧＋.name: Plegian Axe+
SID_ペレジアの斧＋.description:
If unit is not adjacent to an ally, inflicts penalty
on foe's Atk/Def during combat = 5 + any
current penalty on each of those stats.
(Example: if foe has -7 penalty to Atk, inflicts
Atk-12, for a net penalty of Atk-19 during
combat.) Calculates each stat penalty
independently.

SID_ペレジアの弓.name: Plegian Bow
SID_ペレジアの弓.description:
Effective against flying foes. If unit is not
adjacent to an ally, inflicts penalty on foe's
Atk/Def during combat = 5 + any current
penalty on each of those stats. (Example: if
foe has -7 penalty to Atk, inflicts Atk-12, for
a net penalty of Atk-19 during combat.)
Calculates each stat penalty independently.

SID_ペレジアの弓＋.name: Plegian Bow+
SID_ペレジアの弓＋.description:
Effective against flying foes. If unit is not

SID_仄暗き邪痕の燭台.name: Fell Candelabra
SID_仄暗き邪痕の燭台.description:
Grants Atk+3. At start of turn, if any foes have
the highest Atk, Spd, Def, or Res on the enemy
team, inflicts -6 on those foes' corresponding
stat through their next action.

SID_仄暗き邪竜の松明.name: Fell Flambeau
SID_仄暗き邪竜の松明.description:

If unit is not adjacent to an ally, inflicts penalty

5 + any current penalty on each of those stats.
(Example: if foe has -7 penalty to Atk, inflicts

independently.

SID_ペレジアの燭台.name: Plegian Torch
SID_ペレジアの燭台.description:

SID_ペレジアの燭台＋.description:

SID_飛燕明鏡の瞬撃3.name: Swift Impact
SID_飛燕明鏡の瞬撃3.description:
If unit initiates combat, grants Spd+7, Res+10
during combat and foe cannot make a
follow-up attack.

SID_守備魔防の封印1.name: Chill Def/Res 1
SID_守備魔防の封印1.description:
At start of turn, inflicts Def/Res-3 on foe on
the enemy team with the highest Def+Res
total through its next action.

SID_守備魔防の封印2.name: Chill Def/Res 2
SID_守備魔防の封印2.description:
At start of turn, inflicts Def/Res-5 on foe on
the enemy team with the highest Def+Res
total through its next action.

SID_極光のブレス.name: Aurora Breath
SID_極光のブレス.description:
Grants Atk+3. If unit initiates combat, grants
Atk+6 to unit during combat and unit makes
a guaranteed follow-up attack. If foe initiates
combat, grants Def/Res+6 during combat and
foe cannot make a follow-up attack. If foe's
Range = 2, calculates damage using the lower
of foe's Def or Res.

SID_竜鱗障壁1.name: Dragon Wall 1
SID_竜鱗障壁1.description:
If unit's Res > foe's Res, reduces damage from
attacks during combat and from area-of-effect
Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect
Specials) by percentage = difference between
stats × 2 (max 20%).

SID_竜鱗障壁2.name: Dragon Wall 2
SID_竜鱗障壁2.description:
If unit's Res > foe's Res, reduces damage from
attacks during combat and from area-of-effect
Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect
Specials) by percentage = difference between
stats × 3 (max 30%).

SID_竜鱗障壁3.name: Dragon Wall 3
SID_竜鱗障壁3.description:
If unit's Res > foe's Res, reduces damage from
attacks during combat and from area-of-effect
Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect
Specials) by percentage = difference between
stats × 4 (max 40%).

SID_光輝く翼.name: Wings of Light
SID_光輝く翼.description:
Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+2+X to ally Mythic
Heroes during combat in turns 1 through 5
(X = turn number). (Excludes unit.)

(Effect only active if team includes three or
fewer Mythic Heroes, including unit.)

SID_邪な曲弓.name: Spy-Song Bow
SID_邪な曲弓.description:
Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
Effective against flying foes. If foe's Def ≥ foe's
Res+5, deals +7 damage.

SID_ブレイザブリク.name: Dire Breidablik
SID_ブレイザブリク.description:
Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 to allies
within 2 spaces during combat. Inflicts
Atk/Spd/Def/Res-4 on foes within 2 spaces
during combat.

SID_蒼の天空・承.name: Radiant Aether II
SID_蒼の天空・承.description:
At the start of turn 1, grants Special cooldown
count-2 to unit. Treats foe's Def/Res as if
reduced by 50% during combat. Restores HP
= 50% of damage dealt.

SID_氷の聖鏡・承.name: Ice Mirror II
SID_氷の聖鏡・承.description:
If foe is 2 spaces from unit, reduces damage
from foe's attacks by 40%. After triggering,
boosts damage for unit's next attack by 40% of
unit's Res. (Boost resets at the end of combat.)

SID_護国の堅斧.name: Loyalist Axe
SID_護国の堅斧.description:
Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
If foe initiates combat or if foe's HP ≥ 75% at
start of combat, inflicts Atk/Def-6 on foe during
combat, and also, if foe can make a follow-up
attack, reduces damage from foe's first attack
by 75%.

SID_シャールヴィ.name: Þjálfi
SID_シャールヴィ.description:
Grants Atk+3. If unit is within 3 spaces of an
ally, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+6 to unit during
combat, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up
attack, and reduces the percentage of foe's
"reduce damage by X%" skills by 50%,
but after combat, if unit attacked, deals 20
damage to nearest ally. (Example: a foe with
a "reduce damage by 45%" skill would reduce
damage by 23% instead.)

SID_平和の花.name: Unity Blooms
SID_平和の花.description:
If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, inflicts
Atk/Res-5 on foe during combat, and when
unit deals damage to foe during combat,
restores 4 HP to unit. (Triggers even if
0 damage is dealt.)

SID_平和の花＋.name: Unity Blooms+
SID_平和の花＋.description:
If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, inflicts
Atk/Res-5 on foe during combat, and when
unit deals damage to foe during combat,
restores 4 HP to unit. (Triggers even if
0 damage is dealt.)

SID_約束の花.name: Pact Blooms
SID_約束の花.description:
If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, inflicts
Atk/Res-5 on foe during combat, and when
unit deals damage to foe during combat,
restores 4 HP to unit. (Triggers even if
0 damage is dealt.)

SID_約束の花＋.name: Pact Blooms+
SID_約束の花＋.description:
If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, inflicts
Atk/Res-5 on foe during combat, and when
unit deals damage to foe during combat,
restores 4 HP to unit. (Triggers even if
0 damage is dealt.)

SID_共感の花.name: Amity Blooms
SID_共感の花.description:
If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, inflicts
Atk/Res-5 on foe during combat, and when
unit deals damage to foe during combat,
restores 4 HP to unit. (Triggers even if
0 damage is dealt.)

SID_共感の花＋.name: Amity Blooms+
SID_共感の花＋.description:
If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, inflicts
Atk/Res-5 on foe during combat, and when

restores 4 HP to unit. (Triggers even if
0 damage is dealt.)

SID_守備魔防の密集1.name: Def/Res Form 1
SID_守備魔防の密集1.description:
If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants
Def/Res+X to unit during combat (X = number
of allies within 2 spaces; max 3).

SID_守備魔防の密集2.name: Def/Res Form 2
SID_守備魔防の密集2.description:
If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants
Def/Res+X to unit during combat (X = number
of allies within 2 spaces + 2; max 5).

SID_守備魔防の密集3.name: Def/Res Form 3
SID_守備魔防の密集3.description:
If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants
Def/Res+X to unit during combat (X = 2 ×
number of allies within 2 spaces, + 1; max 7).

SID_不治の幻煙1.name: Fatal Smoke 1
SID_不治の幻煙1.description:
$aIf unit initiates combat, foe cannot recover
HP during or after combat, and after combat,
inflicts【Deep Wounds】on target and foes within
1 space of target.

【Deep Wounds】
Unit's HP cannot be healed through its
next action.

SID_不治の幻煙2.name: Fatal Smoke 2
SID_不治の幻煙2.description:
$aIf unit initiates combat, foe cannot recover
HP during or after combat, and after combat,
inflicts【Deep Wounds】on target and foes within
2 spaces of target.

【Deep Wounds】
Unit's HP cannot be healed through its
next action.

SID_不治の幻煙3.name: Fatal Smoke 3
SID_不治の幻煙3.description:
$aFoe cannot recover HP during or after combat,
and after combat, inflicts【Deep Wounds】on target
and foes within 2 spaces of target.

【Deep Wounds】
Unit's HP cannot be healed through its
next action.

SID_盾の護り手・近間1.name: D/R Near Save 1
SID_盾の護り手・近間1.description:
$aIf a foe uses sword, lance, axe, dragonstone, or
beast damage and initiates combat against an
ally adjacent to unit, triggers【Savior】on unit.

If unit triggers Savior, grants Def/Res+1
during combat.

【Savior】
Unit takes ally's space, enters combat in ally's
place, and receives all after-combat effects.

Savior will not trigger if ally is on terrain that
unit cannot move to or if multiple units are able
to use Savior during the same combat. If Savior
triggers, after-combat movement effects do
not occur.

SID_盾の護り手・近間2.name: D/R Near Save 2
SID_盾の護り手・近間2.description:
$aIf a foe uses sword, lance, axe, dragonstone, or
beast damage and initiates combat against an
ally within 2 spaces of unit, triggers【Savior】
on unit.

If unit triggers Savior, grants Def/Res+2
during combat.

【Savior】
Unit takes ally's space, enters combat in ally's
place, and receives all after-combat effects.

Savior will not trigger if ally is on terrain that
unit cannot move to or if multiple units are able
to use Savior during the same combat. If Savior
triggers, after-combat movement effects do
not occur.

SID_盾の護り手・近間3.name: D/R Near Save 3
SID_盾の護り手・近間3.description:

【Savior】
Unit takes ally's space, enters combat in ally's

Savior will not trigger if ally is on terrain that

not occur.

SID_兜の護り手・遠間1.name: A/R Far Save 1
SID_兜の護り手・遠間1.description:

SID_マスターソード_ATK.description:
Inflicts Spd-5. Unit attacks twice. (Even if foe
initiates combat, unit attacks twice.)

SID_マスターソード_AGI.description:

SID_氷剣アウドムラ_ATK.name: Audhulma (+Mt)
SID_氷剣アウドムラ_ATK.description:
Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
Grants Res+5.

SID_氷剣アウドムラ_AGI.name: Audhulma (+Spd)
SID_氷剣アウドムラ_AGI.description:
Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).

SID_邪な曲弓_邪.name: Spy-Song Bow (Eff)

SID_ギガスカリバー_ATK.name: Giga Excalibur (+Mt)
SID_ギガスカリバー_ATK.description:
Grants Spd+3. Deals damage = 20% of
unit's Spd.

SID_ギガスカリバー_AGI.name: Giga Excalibur (+Spd)
SID_ギガスカリバー_AGI.description:

SID_ギガスカリバー_紋.name: Giga Excalibur (Eff)
SID_ギガスカリバー_紋.description:
Grants Spd+3. Deals damage = 20% of
unit's Spd.

restores 4 HP to unit. (Triggers even if
0 damage is dealt.)

SID_孤絶の剣.name: Unbound Blade
SID_孤絶の剣.description:
If unit is not adjacent to an ally, inflicts
Atk/Def-5 on foe during combat and
neutralizes foe's bonuses to Atk/Def (from
skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

SID_孤絶の剣＋.name: Unbound Blade+
SID_孤絶の剣＋.description:
If unit is not adjacent to an ally, inflicts
Atk/Def-5 on foe during combat and
neutralizes foe's bonuses to Atk/Def (from
skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

SID_シレジアの氷晶.name: Silesse Frost
SID_シレジアの氷晶.description:
Grants Atk+3. At start of combat, if foe's HP
≥ 50%, grants Atk/Spd+6 to unit during combat,
and also, if unit is within 2 spaces of support
partner and initiates combat, unit attacks twice.

SID_スキンファクシ.name: Skinfaxi
SID_スキンファクシ.description:
$aGrants Spd+3 and【Pathfinder】.
At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%,
grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+5 and bonus to
Atk/Spd/Def/Res during combat = current
penalty on each of those stats × 2. (Example:
if unit has -7 penalty to Atk, grants Atk+19,
for a net bonus of Atk+12.) Calculates each
stat bonus independently.

【Pathfinder】
When an ally moves through unit's space, that
space is counted as 0 spaces moved instead of
1 space. (Unit's space can be freely added to
ally's normal movement. Applies only to allies
with movement types that allow movement
through unit's space.)

SID_女神の斧.name: Goddess Axe
SID_女神の斧.description:
Grants Def+5 and inflicts Spd/Res-5 on unit.
Unit attacks twice. (Even if foe initiates combat,
unit attacks twice.)

SID_慕炎の書.name: Sparking Tome
SID_慕炎の書.description:
Grants Spd+3. At start of combat, if foe's HP
≥ 50%, inflicts Spd/Res-6 on foe during combat
and inflicts penalty on foe's Spd/Res during
combat = current bonus on each of foe's
stats × 2. (Example: if foe has +7 bonus to Spd,
inflicts Spd-20, for a net penalty of Spd-13.)
Calculates each stat penalty independently.

SID_赤の死闘・歩行4.name: R Duel Infantry 4
SID_赤の死闘・歩行4.description:
Grants HP+5, Atk/Spd/Def/Res+2. If unit is 5★,
level 40, a Legendary Hero or a Mythic Hero,
and unit's stats total less than 175, treats unit's
stats as 175 in modes like Arena. If unit is 5★,
level 40, not a Legendary Hero or Mythic Hero
and unit's stats total less than 180, treats unit's
stats as 180 in modes like Arena.
(Higher-scoring opponents will appear. Stat
total calculation excludes any values added by
merges and skills.)

SID_青の死闘・飛行4.name: B Duel Flying 4
SID_青の死闘・飛行4.description:
Grants HP+5, Atk/Spd/Def/Res+2. If unit is 5★,
level 40, a Legendary Hero or a Mythic Hero,
and unit's stats total less than 175, treats unit's
stats as 175 in modes like Arena. If unit is 5★,
level 40, not a Legendary Hero or Mythic Hero
and unit's stats total less than 180, treats unit's
stats as 180 in modes like Arena.
(Higher-scoring opponents will appear. Stat
total calculation excludes any values added by
merges and skills.)

SID_孤絶の剣＋_ATK.name: Unbound Blade+ (+Mt)
SID_孤絶の剣＋_ATK.description:

Atk/Def-5 on foe during combat and
neutralizes foe's bonuses to Atk/Def (from
skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

SID_孤絶の剣＋_AGI.name: Unbound Blade+ (+Spd)
SID_孤絶の剣＋_AGI.description:

SID_孤絶の剣＋_RES.name: Unbound Blade+ (+Res)
SID_孤絶の剣＋_RES.description:

Atk/Def-5 on foe during combat and
neutralizes foe's bonuses to Atk/Def (from

SID_フェイルノート.name: Failnaught
SID_フェイルノート.description:
Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
Effective against flying foes. At start of combat,
if unit's HP ≥ 25%, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+5
to unit during combat and neutralizes effects
that guarantee foe's follow-up attacks and
effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks
during combat.

SID_攻撃速さの機先1.name: Atk/Spd Catch 1
SID_攻撃速さの機先1.description:
$aAt start of combat, if foe's HP = 100% or
if【Penalty】is active on foe, grants Atk/Spd+3
to unit during combat.

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next
action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill
like Panic or Threaten and negative status
effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting
movement, or the effects of a skill like
Triangle Adept or Guard).

SID_攻撃速さの機先2.name: Atk/Spd Catch 2
SID_攻撃速さの機先2.description:
$aAt start of combat, if foe’s HP = 100% or
if【Penalty】is active on foe, grants Atk/Spd+4
to unit during combat.

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next
action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill
like Panic or Threaten and negative status
effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting
movement, or the effects of a skill like
Triangle Adept or Guard).

SID_攻撃速さの機先3.name: Atk/Spd Catch 3
SID_攻撃速さの機先3.description:
$aAt start of combat, if foe’s HP = 100% or
if【Penalty】is active on foe, grants Atk/Spd+5
to unit during combat.

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next
action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill
like Panic or Threaten and negative status
effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting
movement, or the effects of a skill like
Triangle Adept or Guard).

SID_攻撃速さの機先4.name: Atk/Spd Catch 4
SID_攻撃速さの機先4.description:
$aAt start of combat, if foe's HP = 100% or
if【Penalty】is active on foe, grants Atk/Spd+7
to unit during combat. At start of combat, if
foe's HP = 100% and【Penalty】is active on
foe, grants an additional Atk/Spd+2 to unit
during combat.

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next
action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill
like Panic or Threaten and negative status
effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting
movement, or the effects of a skill like
Triangle Adept or Guard).

SID_落星.name: Fallen Star
SID_落星.description:
$aIf unit initiates combat, reduces damage from
foe's first attack by 80% during combat, and
after combat, grants【Fallen Star】to unit and
inflicts【Gravity】on target and foes
within 1 space of target.

【Fallen Star】
For 1 turn, during unit's first combat in player
phase and enemy phase, reduces damage from
foe's first attack by 80%.

【Gravity】
Restricts target's movement to 1 space through
its next action.

SID_フリムファクシ.name: Hrímfaxi
SID_フリムファクシ.description:
$aGrants Spd+3. At start of combat, if unit's
HP ≥ 25%, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+5 and
bonus to Atk/Spd/Def/Res during combat =
current bonus on each of unit's stats for 1 turn.
(Example: if unit has +7 bonus to Atk, grants
Atk+12, for a net bonus of Atk+19.) Calculates
each stat bonus independently.
Effect:【Pathfinder】

【Pathfinder】
When an ally moves through unit's space, that
space is counted as 0 spaces moved instead of
1 space. (Unit's space can be freely added to
ally's normal movement. Applies only to allies
with movement types that allow movement
through unit's space.)

SID_ルーン.name: Lúin
SID_ルーン.description:
Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
If unit initiates combat or is within 2 spaces of
an ally, grants Spd+6 during combat, deals
damage = 20% of unit's Spd, and also, if unit's
Spd ≥ foe’s Spd+5, foe cannot counterattack.

SID_護衛の斧.name: Steadfast Axe
SID_護衛の斧.description:
If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants
Atk/Def+5 to unit and neutralizes unit's
penalties to Atk/Def during combat.

SID_護衛の斧＋.name: Steadfast Axe+
SID_護衛の斧＋.description:
If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants
Atk/Def+5 to unit and neutralizes unit's
penalties to Atk/Def during combat.

SID_バンシーΘ.name: Banshee Θ
SID_バンシーΘ.description:
$aAt the start of turns 3 and 4, inflicts
Atk/Spd/Def/Res-6,【Gravity】,【Guard】, and
status preventing counterattacks on closest
foes within 5 spaces of unit through their
next actions.

【Gravity】
Restricts target's movement to 1 space through
its next action.

【Guard】
Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target
per attack during combat through its next action.
(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

SID_氷槍フィンブル.name: Icy Fimbulvetr
SID_氷槍フィンブル.description:
Grants Atk+3. At start of combat, if unit's
HP ≥ 25%, inflicts Atk/Res-6 on foe during
combat.

At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25% and
unit is within 3 spaces of a cavalry or flying
ally, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack,
and also, if unit deals damage to foe during
combat, restores 5 HP to unit. (Triggers even
if 0 damage is dealt.)

SID_青の死闘・歩行4.name: B Duel Infantry 4
SID_青の死闘・歩行4.description:
Grants HP+5, Atk/Spd/Def/Res+2. If unit is 5★,
level 40, a Legendary Hero or a Mythic Hero,
and unit's stats total less than 175, treats unit's
stats as 175 in modes like Arena. If unit is 5★,
level 40, not a Legendary Hero or Mythic Hero,
and unit's stats total less than 180, treats unit's
stats as 180 in modes like Arena.
(Higher-scoring opponents will appear. Stat
total calculation excludes any values added by
merges and skills.)

SID_鎧の護り手・近間1.name: A/D Near Save 1
SID_鎧の護り手・近間1.description:
$aIf a foe uses sword, lance, axe, dragonstone, or
beast damage and initiates combat against an
ally adjacent to unit, triggers【Savior】on unit.

If unit triggers Savior, grants Atk/Def+1
during combat.

【Savior】
Unit takes ally's space, enters combat in ally's
place, and receives all after-combat effects.

Savior will not trigger if ally is on terrain that
unit cannot move to or if multiple units are able
to use Savior during the same combat. If Savior
triggers, after-combat movement effects do
not occur.

SID_鎧の護り手・近間2.name: A/D Near Save 2
SID_鎧の護り手・近間2.description:
$aIf a foe uses sword, lance, axe, dragonstone, or
beast damage and initiates combat against an
ally within 2 spaces of unit, triggers【Savior】
on unit.

If unit triggers Savior, grants Atk/Def+2
during combat.

【Savior】
Unit takes ally's space, enters combat in ally's
place, and receives all after-combat effects.

Savior will not trigger if ally is on terrain that
unit cannot move to or if multiple units are able
to use Savior during the same combat. If Savior
triggers, after-combat movement effects do
not occur.

SID_鎧の護り手・近間3.name: A/D Near Save 3
SID_鎧の護り手・近間3.description:
$aIf a foe uses sword, lance, axe, dragonstone, or
beast damage and initiates combat against an
ally within 2 spaces of unit, triggers【Savior】
on unit.

If unit triggers Savior, grants Atk/Def+4
during combat.

【Savior】
Unit takes ally's space, enters combat in ally's
place, and receives all after-combat effects.

Savior will not trigger if ally is on terrain that
unit cannot move to or if multiple units are able
to use Savior during the same combat. If Savior
triggers, after-combat movement effects do
not occur.

SID_瞬閃アイラの剣_ATK.description:

Grants Atk/Spd+3. During combat, neutralizes

to foe or inflict "Special cooldown charge -X"

SID_瞬閃アイラの剣_AGI.description:

SID_グリモワール_ATK.description:
Unit can move to a space within 2 spaces
of any ally within 2 spaces. If unit is within
2 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Spd+4

SID_グリモワール_AGI.description:

SID_グリモワール_無.name: Grimoire (Eff)

SID_トールハンマー_ATK.description:

SID_トールハンマー_AGI.name: Mjölnir (+Spd)
SID_トールハンマー_AGI.description:

SID_イーヴァルディ_ATK.description:

HP ≥ 75%, grants Atk/Spd/Res+3 to unit
during combat.

SID_イーヴァルディ_AGI.name: Ivaldi (+Spd)
SID_イーヴァルディ_AGI.description:

SID_イーヴァルディ_DEF.name: Ivaldi (+Def)
SID_イーヴァルディ_DEF.description:

SID_イーヴァルディ_RES.name: Ivaldi (+Res)
SID_イーヴァルディ_RES.description:

SID_イーヴァルディ_回.name: Ivaldi (Eff)
SID_イーヴァルディ_回.description:

SID_護衛の斧＋_ATK.name: Steadfast Axe+ (+Mt)
SID_護衛の斧＋_ATK.description:
If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants
Atk/Def+5 to unit and neutralizes unit's
penalties to Atk/Def during combat.

SID_護衛の斧＋_AGI.description:

SID_遠距離防御の弓.name: Guard Bow
SID_遠距離防御の弓.description:
Effective against flying foes. If foe initiates
combat and uses bow, dagger, magic, or
staff, grants Def/Res+6 to unit during
combat.

SID_遠距離防御の弓＋.name: Guard Bow+
SID_遠距離防御の弓＋.description:
Effective against flying foes. If foe initiates
combat and uses bow, dagger, magic, or
staff, grants Def/Res+6 to unit during
combat.

SID_アブゾーブ＋.name: Absorb+
SID_アブゾーブ＋.description:
Restores HP = 50% of damage dealt.
After combat, if unit attacked, restores
7 HP to allies within 2 spaces of unit.

SID_フィアー＋.name: Fear+
SID_フィアー＋.description:
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts Atk-7
on target and foes within 2 spaces of target
through their next actions.

SID_スロウ＋.name: Slow+
SID_スロウ＋.description:
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts Spd-7
on target and foes within 2 spaces of target
through their next actions.

SID_グラビティ＋.name: Gravity+
SID_グラビティ＋.description:
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts status
on target and foes within 1 space of target
restricting movement to 1 space through
their next actions.

SID_ペイン＋.name: Pain+
SID_ペイン＋.description:
Deals 10 damage to target and foes
within 2 spaces of target after combat.

SID_パニック＋.name: Panic+
SID_パニック＋.description:
After combat, if unit attacked, converts
bonuses on target and foes within 2 spaces
of target into penalties through their next
actions.

SID_キャンドル＋.name: Candlelight+
SID_キャンドル＋.description:
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts status
on target and foes within 2 spaces of target
preventing counterattacks through their
next actions.

SID_リブロー＋.name: Physic+
SID_リブロー＋.description:
Restores HP = 50% of Atk. (Minimum of
8 HP.) Range = 2.

SID_リカバー＋.name: Recover+
SID_リカバー＋.description:
Restores HP = 50% of Atk +10.
(Minimum of 15 HP.)

SID_セインツ＋.name: Martyr+
SID_セインツ＋.description:
Restores HP = damage dealt to unit +50%
of Atk. (Minimum of 7 HP.) Restores HP to
unit = half damage dealt to unit.

SID_リバース＋.name: Rehabilitate+
SID_リバース＋.description:
Restores HP = 50% of Atk -10.
(Minimum of 7 HP.) If target's HP
is ≤ 50%, the lower the target's HP,
the more HP is restored.

SID_レーヴァテイン.name: Laevatein
SID_レーヴァテイン.description:
Grants Atk+3. Grants bonus to unit’s Atk = total
bonuses on unit during combat.

SID_レイプト.name: Leiptr
SID_レイプト.description: Unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range.

SID_シンモラ.name: Sinmara
SID_シンモラ.description:
Grants Def+3. At start of turn, deals
20 damage to foes within 2 spaces.

SID_セック.name: Thökk
SID_セック.description:
Calculates damage from staff like other
weapons. At start of turn, if foe's HP ≤ unit's
HP-3 and foe is in cardinal direction and
uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff, foe
cannot move more than 1 space through its
action.

SID_氷の聖鏡.name: Ice Mirror
SID_氷の聖鏡.description:
If foe is 2 spaces from unit, reduces damage
from foe's attacks by 30%. Boosts unit's next
attack by total damage reduced (by any
source, including other skills) when Special
triggers. Resets at end of combat. (Skill
cannot be inherited.)

SID_攻撃守備の絆1.name: Atk/Def Bond 1
SID_攻撃守備の絆1.description:
If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Def+3
during combat.

SID_攻撃守備の絆2.name: Atk/Def Bond 2
SID_攻撃守備の絆2.description:
If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Def+4
during combat.

SID_攻撃守備の絆3.name: Atk/Def Bond 3
SID_攻撃守備の絆3.description:
If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Def+5
during combat.

SID_黒き血の大剣.name: Dark Greatsword
SID_黒き血の大剣.description:
If unit initiates combat, grants Atk/Spd+4
during combat.

SID_白き血の薙刀.name: Bright Naginata
SID_白き血の薙刀.description:
If foe initiates combat, grants Atk/Def+4
during combat.

SID_攻撃守備の応援.name: Rally Atk/Def
SID_攻撃守備の応援.description: Grants Atk/Def+3 to target ally for 1 turn.

SID_攻撃の指揮1.name: Atk Tactic 1
SID_攻撃の指揮1.description:
At start of turn, grants Atk+2 to allies within 2
spaces for 1 turn. Granted only if number of
that ally's movement type on current team
≤ 2.

SID_攻撃の指揮2.name: Atk Tactic 2
SID_攻撃の指揮2.description:
At start of turn, grants Atk+4 to allies within 2

that ally's movement type on current team
≤ 2.

SID_攻撃の指揮3.name: Atk Tactic 3
SID_攻撃の指揮3.description:
