SID_速さ魔防の攻城戦2.name: AR-O Spd/Res 2
SID_速さ魔防の攻城戦2.description:
If attacking in Aether Raids, grants Spd/Res+X
during combat. (Calculates X based on number
of foe's defensive structures: ≤2 structures
grants +7; 3 grants +5; 4 grants +3; ≥5 grants
+1. Destroyed defensive structures are not
counted.)

SID_速さ魔防の攻城戦3.name: AR-O Spd/Res 3
SID_速さ魔防の攻城戦3.description:
If attacking in Aether Raids, grants Spd/Res+X
during combat. (Calculates X based on number
of foe's defensive structures: ≤2 structures
grants +10; 3 grants +7; 4 grants +4; ≥5 grants
+1. Destroyed defensive structures are not
counted.)

SID_緋剣デュランダル.name: Ardent Durandal
SID_緋剣デュランダル.description:
$aGrants Atk+3. At start of turn, grants
【Bonus Doubler】to ally with the highest Atk.

【Bonus Doubler】
Grants bonus to Atk/Spd/Def/Res during
combat = current bonus on each of unit's stats
for 1 turn. Calculates each stat bonus
independently.

SID_速さ魔防の応援＋.name: Rally Spd/Res+
SID_速さ魔防の応援＋.description: Grants Spd/Res+6 to target ally for 1 turn.

SID_理想郷となるように.name: Vision of Arcadia
SID_理想郷となるように.description:
At start of turn, if a dragon or beast ally is
deployed, grants Atk/Def+6 to ally with the
highest Atk for 1 turn.

SID_明日の聖騎士の剣.name: Rowdy Sword
SID_明日の聖騎士の剣.description:
Inflicts Spd-5. If unit initiates combat, unit attacks
twice.

SID_密偵の暗器.name: Spy's Dagger
SID_密偵の暗器.description:
$aAfter combat, if unit attacked, grants
Def/Res+6 to unit and allies within 2 spaces of
unit for 1 turn.
Effect:【Dagger ６】

【Dagger ６】
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-６ on target and foes within
2 spaces of target through their next actions.

SID_山の隠者の書.name: Hermit's Tome
SID_山の隠者の書.description:
Effective against cavalry foes. If foe uses bow,
dagger, magic, or staff, neutralizes foe's
bonuses (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.)
during combat.

SID_日傘.name: Petal Parasol
SID_日傘.description:
$aIf【Penalty】is active on foe, grants
Atk/Spd+5 during combat.

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next
action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill
like Panic or Threaten and negative status
effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting
movement, or the effects of a skill like
Triangle Adept or Guard).

SID_日傘＋.name: Petal Parasol+
SID_日傘＋.description:
$aIf【Penalty】is active on foe, grants
Atk/Spd+5 during combat.

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next
action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill
like Panic or Threaten and negative status
effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting
movement, or the effects of a skill like
Triangle Adept or Guard).

SID_絶海の蒼弓.name: Deep-Blue Bow
SID_絶海の蒼弓.description:
Grants Spd+3. Effective against flying and
armored foes. If foe's HP = 100% and unit
initiates combat, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4
during combat.

SID_大漁の弓.name: Big-Catch Bow
SID_大漁の弓.description:
$aEffective against flying foes. If【Penalty】is
active on foe, grants Atk/Spd+5 during combat.

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next
action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill
like Panic or Threaten and negative status
effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting
movement, or the effects of a skill like
Triangle Adept or Guard).

SID_大漁の弓＋.name: Big-Catch Bow+
SID_大漁の弓＋.description:
$aEffective against flying foes. If【Penalty】is
active on foe, grants Atk/Spd+5 during combat.

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next
action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill
like Panic or Threaten and negative status
effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting
movement, or the effects of a skill like
Triangle Adept or Guard).

SID_葉の扇.name: Broadleaf Fan
SID_葉の扇.description:
$aGrants bonus to unit's Atk = total penalties
on foe during combat.
Effect:【Dagger ５】

【Dagger ５】
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-５ on target and foes within
2 spaces of target through their next actions.

SID_葉の扇＋.name: Broadleaf Fan+
SID_葉の扇＋.description:
$aGrants bonus to unit's Atk = total penalties
on foe during combat.
Effect:【Dagger ７】

【Dagger ７】
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-７ on target and foes within
2 spaces of target through their next actions.

SID_貝殻のナイフ.name: Scallop Blade
SID_貝殻のナイフ.description:
$aIf【Penalty】is active on foe, grants
Atk/Spd+5 during combat.
Effect:【Dagger ５】

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next
action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill
like Panic or Threaten and negative status
effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting
movement, or the effects of a skill like
Triangle Adept or Guard).

【Dagger ５】
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-５ on target and foes within
2 spaces of target through their next actions.

SID_貝殻のナイフ＋.name: Scallop Blade+
SID_貝殻のナイフ＋.description:
$aIf【Penalty】is active on foe, grants
Atk/Spd+5 during combat.
Effect:【Dagger ７】

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next
action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill
like Panic or Threaten and negative status
effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting
movement, or the effects of a skill like
Triangle Adept or Guard).

【Dagger ７】
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-７ on target and foes within
2 spaces of target through their next actions.

SID_攻撃速さの大覚醒4.name: Brazen Atk/Spd 4
SID_攻撃速さの大覚醒4.description:
At start of combat, if unit's HP ≤ 80%, grants
Atk+9 and Spd+10 during combat.

SID_守備の混乱1.name: Sabotage Def 1
SID_守備の混乱1.description:
At start of turn, if any foe's Res ≤ unit's Res-3
and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts
Def-3 on that foe through its next action.

SID_守備の混乱2.name: Sabotage Def 2
SID_守備の混乱2.description:
At start of turn, if any foe's Res ≤ unit's Res-3
and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts
Def-5 on that foe through its next action.

SID_守備の混乱3.name: Sabotage Def 3
SID_守備の混乱3.description:
At start of turn, if any foe's Res ≤ unit's Res-3
and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts
Def-7 on that foe through its next action.

SID_守備魔防の大共謀1.name: Def/Res Ruse 1
SID_守備魔防の大共謀1.description:
$aIf a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets
unit, inflicts Def/Res-1 and【Guard】on
foes in cardinal directions of unit and target
through their next actions.

【Guard】
Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target
per attack during combat through its next action.
(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

SID_守備魔防の大共謀2.name: Def/Res Ruse 2
SID_守備魔防の大共謀2.description:
$aIf a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets
unit, inflicts Def/Res-3 and【Guard】on
foes in cardinal directions of unit and target
through their next actions.

【Guard】
Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target
per attack during combat through its next action.
(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

SID_守備魔防の大共謀3.name: Def/Res Ruse 3
SID_守備魔防の大共謀3.description:
$aIf a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets
unit, inflicts Def/Res-5 and【Guard】on
foes in cardinal directions of unit and target
through their next actions.

【Guard】
Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target
per attack during combat through its next action.
(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

SID_天帝の剣.name: Creator Sword
SID_天帝の剣.description:
Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
During combat, neutralizes effects that
guarantee foe's follow-up attacks, prevent
unit's follow-up attacks, grant "Special
cooldown charge +X" to foe, or inflict "Special
cooldown charge -X" on unit.

SID_高潔の戦槍.name: Noble Lance
SID_高潔の戦槍.description:
Grants Atk+3. At start of combat, if both unit's
and foe's HP = 100% or if both unit's and foe's
HP < 100%, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up
attack.

SID_覇道の戦斧.name: Victorious Axe
SID_覇道の戦斧.description:
Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
If the number of foes within 2 spaces
(excluding target) ≥ the number of allies within
2 spaces (excluding unit), unit makes a
guaranteed follow-up attack.

SID_謀略の戦弓.name: Cunning Bow
SID_謀略の戦弓.description:
Grants Spd+3. Effective against flying foes.
When total bonuses on unit + total penalties
on foe ≥ 10, inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-5 on foe
during combat. (Example: if unit has a +5 bonus
and foe has a -5 penalty, the calculated total
will be 10.)

SID_アサメイの短剣.name: Athame
SID_アサメイの短剣.description:
$aGrants Res+3. At start of combat, if foe’s HP <
100%, grants Atk/Spd+5 during combat, and if
foe initiates combat, unit can counterattack
before foe’s first attack.
Effect:【Dagger ７】

【Dagger ７】
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-７ on target and foes within
2 spaces of target through their next actions.

SID_破天.name: Ruptured Sky
SID_破天.description:
Boosts damage by 20% of foe's Atk. If in
combat against a dragon foe or beast foe,
boosts damage by 40% instead of 20%.

SID_攻撃守備の凪1.name: Lull Atk/Def 1
SID_攻撃守備の凪1.description:
Inflicts Atk/Def-1 on foe and neutralizes foe's
bonuses to Atk/Def (from skills like Fortify,
Rally, etc.) during combat.

SID_攻撃守備の凪2.name: Lull Atk/Def 2
SID_攻撃守備の凪2.description:
Inflicts Atk/Def-2 on foe and neutralizes foe's
bonuses to Atk/Def (from skills like Fortify,
Rally, etc.) during combat.

SID_攻撃守備の凪3.name: Lull Atk/Def 3
SID_攻撃守備の凪3.description:
Inflicts Atk/Def-3 on foe and neutralizes foe's
bonuses to Atk/Def (from skills like Fortify,
Rally, etc.) during combat.

SID_速さ守備の凪1.name: Lull Spd/Def 1
SID_速さ守備の凪1.description:
Inflicts Spd/Def-1 on foe and neutralizes foe's
bonuses to Spd/Def (from skills like Fortify,
Rally, etc.) during combat.

SID_速さ守備の凪2.name: Lull Spd/Def 2
SID_速さ守備の凪2.description:
Inflicts Spd/Def-2 on foe and neutralizes foe's
bonuses to Spd/Def (from skills like Fortify,
Rally, etc.) during combat.

SID_速さ守備の凪3.name: Lull Spd/Def 3
SID_速さ守備の凪3.description:
Inflicts Spd/Def-3 on foe and neutralizes foe's
bonuses to Spd/Def (from skills like Fortify,
Rally, etc.) during combat.

SID_攻撃守備の奮起1.name: Rouse Atk/Def 1
SID_攻撃守備の奮起1.description:
At start of turn, if unit is not adjacent to an ally,
grants Atk/Def+2 to unit for 1 turn.

SID_攻撃守備の奮起2.name: Rouse Atk/Def 2
SID_攻撃守備の奮起2.description:
At start of turn, if unit is not adjacent to an ally,
grants Atk/Def+4 to unit for 1 turn.

SID_攻撃守備の奮起3.name: Rouse Atk/Def 3
SID_攻撃守備の奮起3.description:
At start of turn, if unit is not adjacent to an ally,
grants Atk/Def+6 to unit for 1 turn.

SID_天帝の波動.name: Sublime Surge
SID_天帝の波動.description:
Neutralizes "effective against dragons" bonuses.
Unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range.
If foe's Range = 2, calculates damage using the
lower of foe's Def or Res.

SID_天狼.name: Sirius
SID_天狼.description:
Boosts damage by 30% of unit's Spd. Restores
HP = 30% of damage dealt.

SID_始まりの鼓動1.name: Time's Pulse 1
SID_始まりの鼓動1.description:
At the start of every third turn, if Special
cooldown count is at its maximum value, grants
Special cooldown count-1.

SID_始まりの鼓動2.name: Time's Pulse 2
SID_始まりの鼓動2.description:
At start of odd-numbered turns, if Special
cooldown count is at its maximum value, grants
Special cooldown count-1.

SID_始まりの鼓動3.name: Time's Pulse 3
SID_始まりの鼓動3.description:
At start of turn, if Special cooldown count is at
its maximum value, grants Special cooldown
count-1.

SID_ルーナの鋭剣.name: Selena's Blade
SID_ルーナの鋭剣.description:
Effective against armored foes. At start of
combat, if foe's Atk ≥ unit's Atk+3, grants
Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3 during combat.

SID_金蘭の書.name: Book of Orchids
SID_金蘭の書.description:
If unit initiates combat, grants Atk+6 during
combat.

SID_金石の書.name: Inscribed Tome
SID_金石の書.description:
Grants weapon-triangle advantage against
colorless foes, and inflicts weapon-triangle
disadvantage on colorless foes during combat.

SID_サリエルの大鎌.name: Scythe of Sariel
SID_サリエルの大鎌.description:
Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
If a bonus granted by a skill like Rally or Hone
and/or extra movement granted by a skill like
Armor March or Armored Boots is active on foe,
grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 to unit during combat
and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

SID_フライクーゲル.name: Freikugel
SID_フライクーゲル.description:
Grants Spd+3. At start of ally's combat, if unit
is within 2 spaces of any allies with Def > unit's
Def, grants Atk/Spd+4 to those allies during
combat.  At start of unit's combat, if unit is not
within 2 spaces of any allies with Def > unit's
Def, grants Atk/Spd+6 to unit during combat.

SID_狩猟の鋭刃.name: Hunting Blade
SID_狩猟の鋭刃.description:
$aAccelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
Effective against beast foes. At start of combat,
if unit's Atk/Spd/Def/Res < that of an ally within
2 spaces, grants +5 to unit's corresponding
stat during combat. Calculates each stat bonus
independently.
Effect:【Dagger ７】

【Dagger ７】
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-７ on target and foes within
2 spaces of target through their next actions.

SID_ラウアフォックス.name: Rauðrfox
SID_ラウアフォックス.description:
If unit initiates combat, inflicts
Atk/Spd/Def/Res-4 on foe
during combat.

SID_ラウアフォックス＋.name: Rauðrfox+
SID_ラウアフォックス＋.description:
If unit initiates combat, inflicts
Atk/Spd/Def/Res-4 on foe
during combat.

SID_攻撃速さの密集1.name: Atk/Spd Form 1
SID_攻撃速さの密集1.description:
If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants
Atk/Spd+X to unit during combat (X = number
of allies within 2 spaces; max 3).

SID_攻撃速さの密集2.name: Atk/Spd Form 2
SID_攻撃速さの密集2.description:
If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants
Atk/Spd+X to unit during combat (X = number
of allies within 2 spaces + 2; max 5).

SID_攻撃速さの密集3.name: Atk/Spd Form 3
SID_攻撃速さの密集3.description:
If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants
Atk/Spd+X to unit during combat (X = 2 ×
number of allies within 2 spaces, + 1; max 7).

SID_速さ魔防の防城戦1.name: AR-D Spd/Res 1
SID_速さ魔防の防城戦1.description:
If defending in Aether Raids, grants Spd/Res+X
during combat. (Calculates X based on number
of your defensive structures: ≥5 structures
grants +4; 4 grants +3; 3 grants +2; ≤2 grants
+1. Destroyed defensive structures are not
counted.)

SID_速さ魔防の防城戦2.name: AR-D Spd/Res 2
SID_速さ魔防の防城戦2.description:
If defending in Aether Raids, grants Spd/Res+X
during combat. (Calculates X based on number
of your defensive structures: ≥5 structures
grants +7; 4 grants +5; 3 grants +3; ≤2 grants
+1. Destroyed defensive structures are not
counted.)

SID_速さ魔防の防城戦3.name: AR-D Spd/Res 3
SID_速さ魔防の防城戦3.description:
If defending in Aether Raids, grants Spd/Res+X
during combat. (Calculates X based on number
of your defensive structures: ≥5 structures
grants +10; 4 grants +7; 3 grants +4; ≤2 grants
+1. Destroyed defensive structures are not
counted.)

SID_歩行の魔刃1.name: Inf. Hexblade 1
SID_歩行の魔刃1.description:
If adjacent infantry allies use sword, lance, axe,
bow, or dagger, calculates their damage using
the lower of foe's Def or Res during combat.
(Does not affect damage dealt by Specials that
trigger before combat.)

SID_歩行の魔刃2.name: Inf. Hexblade 2
SID_歩行の魔刃2.description:
If adjacent infantry allies use sword, lance, axe,
bow, or dagger, grants Atk/Spd+1 to those allies
and calculates their damage using the lower of
foe's Def or Res during combat. (Does not
affect damage dealt by Specials that trigger
before combat.)

SID_歩行の魔刃3.name: Inf. Hexblade 3
SID_歩行の魔刃3.description:
If adjacent infantry allies use sword, lance, axe,
bow, or dagger, grants Atk/Spd+2 to those allies
and calculates their damage using the lower of
foe's Def or Res during combat. (Does not
affect damage dealt by Specials that trigger
before combat.)

SID_竜剣ファルシオン.name: Dracofalchion
SID_竜剣ファルシオン.description:
Effective against dragon foes. Grants Atk+3. If
the number of foes within 2 spaces (excluding
target) ≥ the number of allies within 2 spaces
(excluding unit), grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+5
during combat.

SID_氷精ニニスの槍.name: Ninis's Ice Lance
SID_氷精ニニスの槍.description:
Effective against dragon and beast foes.
Grants Spd+3. If unit initiates combat, grants
Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 during combat.

SID_暁の光.name: Light of Dawn
SID_暁の光.description:
Effective against armored and cavalry foes.
Grants Res+3. Grants bonus to Atk/Spd/Def/Res
during combat = current penalty on each of
target's stats. Calculates each stat bonus
independently.

SID_サングリズル.name: Sanngriðr
SID_サングリズル.description:
$aFoe cannot counterattack. If unit initiates
combat, grants Atk/Spd+3 during combat.
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts【Gravity】
on target and foes within 1 space of target.

【Gravity】
Restricts target's movement to 1 space through
its next action.

SID_覇神断竜剣.name: Scendscale
SID_覇神断竜剣.description:
Deals damage = 25% of unit's Atk, but after
combat, if unit attacked, deals 7 damage to
unit.

SID_攻撃魔防の絆4.name: Atk/Res Bond 4
SID_攻撃魔防の絆4.description:
If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants
Atk/Res+7 to unit and neutralizes unit's
penalties to Atk/Res during combat.

SID_攻撃速さの渾身4.name: Atk/Spd Push 4
SID_攻撃速さの渾身4.description:
At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%,
grants Atk/Spd+7, but after combat, if unit
attacked, deals 5 damage to unit.

SID_ユンヌの囁き.name: Yune's Whispers
SID_ユンヌの囁き.description:
At start of turn, if any foe's Res ≤ unit's Res-3
and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts
Atk/Spd-6 on that foe through its next action.

SID_攻撃速さの大共謀1.name: Atk/Spd Ruse 1
SID_攻撃速さの大共謀1.description:
$aIf a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets
unit, inflicts Atk/Spd-1 and【Guard】on
foes in cardinal directions of unit and target
through their next actions.

【Guard】
Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target
per attack during combat through its next action.
(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

SID_攻撃速さの大共謀2.name: Atk/Spd Ruse 2
SID_攻撃速さの大共謀2.description:
$aIf a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets
unit, inflicts Atk/Spd-3 and【Guard】on
foes in cardinal directions of unit and target
through their next actions.

【Guard】
Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target
per attack during combat through its next action.
(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

SID_攻撃速さの大共謀3.name: Atk/Spd Ruse 3
SID_攻撃速さの大共謀3.description:
$aIf a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets
unit, inflicts Atk/Spd-5 and【Guard】on
foes in cardinal directions of unit and target
through their next actions.

【Guard】
Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target
per attack during combat through its next action.
(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

SID_攻撃速さの威嚇1.name: Threat. Atk/Spd 1
SID_攻撃速さの威嚇1.description:
At start of turn, inflicts Atk/Spd-3 on foes within
2 spaces through their next actions.

SID_攻撃速さの威嚇2.name: Threat. Atk/Spd 2
SID_攻撃速さの威嚇2.description:
At start of turn, inflicts Atk/Spd-4 on foes within
2 spaces through their next actions.

SID_攻撃速さの威嚇3.name: Threat. Atk/Spd 3
SID_攻撃速さの威嚇3.description:
At start of turn, if unit is within 2 spaces of a
foe, grants Atk/Spd+5 to unit for 1 turn and
inflicts Atk/Spd-5 on foes within 2 spaces
through their next actions.

SID_至聖ナーガ.name: Virtuous Naga
SID_至聖ナーガ.description:
Effective against dragon foes. Grants Atk+3.
At start of combat, if unit’s Atk > foe’s Atk,
grants Atk/Res+6 during combat.

SID_光と闇と.name: Light and Dark
SID_光と闇と.description:
Inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-2 on foe, neutralizes
foe's bonuses (from skills like Fortify, Rally,
etc.), and disables foe's skills that "calculate
damage using the lower of foe's Def or Res"
during combat.

SID_攻撃魔防の信義1.name: Atk/Res Oath 1
SID_攻撃魔防の信義1.description:
At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to an ally,
grants Atk/Res+3 to unit for 1 turn.

SID_攻撃魔防の信義2.name: Atk/Res Oath 2
SID_攻撃魔防の信義2.description:
At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to an ally,
grants Atk/Res+4 to unit for 1 turn.

SID_攻撃魔防の信義3.name: Atk/Res Oath 3
SID_攻撃魔防の信義3.description:
At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to an ally,
grants Atk/Res+5 to unit for 1 turn.

SID_ヴェルザンディ.name: Verðandi
SID_ヴェルザンディ.description:
If Sing or Dance is used, grants
Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 to target.

SID_弦楽器の弓.name: Fiddlestick Bow
SID_弦楽器の弓.description:
Effective against flying foes. Grants Def/Res+4
to allies within 2 spaces during combat against
sword, lance, axe, dragonstone, or beast foes.

SID_弦楽器の弓＋.name: Fiddlestick Bow+
SID_弦楽器の弓＋.description:
Effective against flying foes. Grants Def/Res+4
to allies within 2 spaces during combat against
sword, lance, axe, dragonstone, or beast foes.

SID_メグスラシル.name: Mögþrasir
SID_メグスラシル.description:
Inflicts Spd-2. If unit initiates combat, unit attacks
twice.

SID_銀のゴブレット.name: Silver Goblet
SID_銀のゴブレット.description:
Grants Def/Res+4 to allies within 2 spaces
during combat against bow, dagger, magic,
or staff foes.

SID_銀のゴブレット＋.name: Silver Goblet+
SID_銀のゴブレット＋.description:
Grants Def/Res+4 to allies within 2 spaces
during combat against bow, dagger, magic,
or staff foes.

SID_ヴァフスルーズニル.name: Vafþrúðnir
SID_ヴァフスルーズニル.description:
Inflicts Spd-5. If unit initiates combat, unit attacks
twice.

SID_青の死闘・歩行1.name: B Duel Infantry 1
SID_青の死闘・歩行1.description:
Grants HP+3. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and
unit's stats total less than 160, treats unit's
stats as 160 in modes like Arena.
(Higher-scoring opponents will appear.
Stat total calculation excludes any values
added by merges and skills.)

SID_青の死闘・歩行2.name: B Duel Infantry 2
SID_青の死闘・歩行2.description:
Grants HP+4. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and
unit's stats total less than 165, treats unit's
stats as 165 in modes like Arena.
(Higher-scoring opponents will appear.
Stat total calculation excludes any values
added by merges and skills.)

SID_青の死闘・歩行3.name: B Duel Infantry 3
SID_青の死闘・歩行3.description:
Grants HP+5. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and
unit's stats total less than 170, treats unit's
stats as 170 in modes like Arena.
(Higher-scoring opponents will appear.
Stat total calculation excludes any values
added by merges and skills.)

SID_業火大地の舞い1.name: Caldera Dance 1
SID_業火大地の舞い1.description:
If Sing or Dance is used, grants Atk+2 and
Def+3 to target.

SID_業火大地の舞い2.name: Caldera Dance 2
SID_業火大地の舞い2.description:
If Sing or Dance is used, grants Atk+3 and
Def+4 to target.

SID_攻撃の相互鼓舞.name: Joint Hone Atk
SID_攻撃の相互鼓舞.description:
At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to an ally,
grants Atk+5 to unit and adjacent allies for
1 turn.

SID_レイピア.name: Rapier
SID_レイピア.description:
Effective against armored and cavalry foes.
Grants Spd+3. If unit’s HP ≤ 75% and foe
initiates combat, unit can counterattack
before foe's first attack.

SID_メリクル.name: Mercurius
SID_メリクル.description:
Grants Atk+3. At start of turn, if unit's HP ≥
50%, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 to unit and
sword, lance, axe, bow, dagger, or beast allies
within 2 spaces for 1 turn. (Bonus granted to
unit even if no allies are within 2 spaces.)

SID_黒騎の孤槍.name: Sable Lance
SID_黒騎の孤槍.description:
Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants
Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 during combat.

SID_異空のブレス.name: Ethereal Breath
SID_異空のブレス.description:
Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
Effective against dragon foes. Grants weapon-
triangle advantage against colorless foes, and
inflicts weapon-triangle disadvantage on
colorless foes during combat. Reduces damage
from area-of-effect Specials by 80% (excluding
Røkkr area-of-effect Specials). If foe's Range =
2, calculates damage using the lower of foe's
Def or Res.

SID_速さ守備の密集1.name: Spd/Def Form 1
SID_速さ守備の密集1.description:
If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants
Spd/Def+X to unit during combat (X = number
of allies within 2 spaces; max 3).

SID_速さ守備の密集2.name: Spd/Def Form 2
SID_速さ守備の密集2.description:
If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants
Spd/Def+X to unit during combat (X = number
of allies within 2 spaces + 2; max 5).

SID_速さ守備の密集3.name: Spd/Def Form 3
SID_速さ守備の密集3.description:
If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants
Spd/Def+X to unit during combat (X = 2 ×
number of allies within 2 spaces, + 1; max 7).

SID_速さ守備の大覚醒1.name: Brazen Spd/Def 1
SID_速さ守備の大覚醒1.description:
At start of combat, if unit's HP ≤ 80%, grants
Spd/Def+3 during combat.

SID_速さ守備の大覚醒2.name: Brazen Spd/Def 2
SID_速さ守備の大覚醒2.description:
At start of combat, if unit's HP ≤ 80%, grants
Spd/Def+5 during combat.

SID_速さ守備の大覚醒3.name: Brazen Spd/Def 3
SID_速さ守備の大覚醒3.description:
At start of combat, if unit's HP ≤ 80%, grants
Spd/Def+7 during combat.

SID_攻撃速さの凪1.name: Lull Atk/Spd 1
SID_攻撃速さの凪1.description:
Inflicts Atk/Spd-1 on foe and neutralizes foe's
bonuses to Atk/Spd (from skills like Fortify,
Rally, etc.) during combat.

SID_攻撃速さの凪2.name: Lull Atk/Spd 2
SID_攻撃速さの凪2.description:
Inflicts Atk/Spd-2 on foe and neutralizes foe's
bonuses to Atk/Spd (from skills like Fortify,
Rally, etc.) during combat.

SID_攻撃速さの凪3.name: Lull Atk/Spd 3
SID_攻撃速さの凪3.description:
Inflicts Atk/Spd-3 on foe and neutralizes foe's
bonuses to Atk/Spd (from skills like Fortify,
Rally, etc.) during combat.

SID_死んでほしいの.name: Killing Intent
SID_死んでほしいの.description:
$aAt start of combat, if foe's HP < 100% or
if【Penalty】is active on foe, inflicts
Spd/Res-5 on foe, and if unit initiates combat,
unit can make a follow-up attack before foe
can counterattack.

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next
action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill
like Panic or Threaten and negative status
effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting
movement, or the effects of a skill like
Triangle Adept or Guard).

SID_恐慌の幻煙1.name: Panic Smoke 1
SID_恐慌の幻煙1.description:
$aIf unit initiates combat, inflicts【Panic】
on target and foes within 1 space of target
after combat.

【Panic】
Converts bonuses on target into penalties
through its next action.

SID_恐慌の幻煙2.name: Panic Smoke 2
SID_恐慌の幻煙2.description:
$aIf unit initiates combat, inflicts【Panic】
on target and foes within 2 spaces of target
after combat.

【Panic】
Converts bonuses on target into penalties
through its next action.

SID_恐慌の幻煙3.name: Panic Smoke 3
SID_恐慌の幻煙3.description:
$aInflicts【Panic】on target and foes
within 2 spaces of target after combat.

【Panic】
Converts bonuses on target into penalties
through its next action.

SID_貴族的な弓.name: Dignified Bow
SID_貴族的な弓.description:
$aEffective against flying foes. At start of turn,
if any foe's HP ≤ unit's HP-1 and that foe is
adjacent to another foe, inflicts【Panic】on
that foe.

【Panic】
Converts bonuses on target into penalties
through its next action.

SID_魔月の祭器.name: Conjurer Curios
SID_魔月の祭器.description:
Effective against armored foes. Grants Atk+3.
If it is an odd-numbered turn or if foe's
HP < 100% at start of combat, grants
Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 to unit during combat.

SID_ロウソクの弓.name: Candlewax Bow
SID_ロウソクの弓.description:
Effective against flying foes. Grants
Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3. After combat,
deals 6 damage to unit.

SID_ロウソクの弓＋.name: Candlewax Bow+
SID_ロウソクの弓＋.description:
Effective against flying foes. Grants
Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3. After combat,
deals 6 damage to unit.

SID_びっくり箱.name: Pumpkin-a-Box
SID_びっくり箱.description:
$aGrants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3. After combat,
deals 6 damage to unit.
Effect:【Dagger ５】

【Dagger ５】
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-５ on target and foes within
2 spaces of target through their next actions.

SID_びっくり箱＋.name: Pumpkin-a-Box+
SID_びっくり箱＋.description:
$aGrants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3. After combat,
deals 6 damage to unit.
Effect:【Dagger ７】

【Dagger ７】
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-７ on target and foes within
2 spaces of target through their next actions.

SID_カボチャの行灯.name: Spooky Censer
SID_カボチャの行灯.description:
Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3. After combat,
deals 6 damage to unit.

SID_カボチャの行灯＋.name: Spooky Censer+
SID_カボチャの行灯＋.description:
Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3. After combat,
deals 6 damage to unit.

SID_フラスコ.name: Madness Flask
SID_フラスコ.description:
Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3. After combat,
deals 6 damage to unit.

SID_フラスコ＋.name: Madness Flask+
SID_フラスコ＋.description:
Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3. After combat,
deals 6 damage to unit.

SID_攻撃守備の防城戦1.name: AR-D Atk/Def 1
SID_攻撃守備の防城戦1.description:
If defending in Aether Raids, grants Atk/Def+X
during combat. (Calculates X based on number
of your defensive structures: ≥5 structures
grants +4; 4 grants +3; 3 grants +2; ≤2 grants
+1. Destroyed defensive structures are not
counted.)

SID_攻撃守備の防城戦2.name: AR-D Atk/Def 2
SID_攻撃守備の防城戦2.description:
If defending in Aether Raids, grants Atk/Def+X
during combat. (Calculates X based on number
of your defensive structures: ≥5 structures
grants +7; 4 grants +5; 3 grants +3; ≤2 grants
+1. Destroyed defensive structures are not
counted.)

SID_攻撃守備の防城戦3.name: AR-D Atk/Def 3
SID_攻撃守備の防城戦3.description:
If defending in Aether Raids, grants Atk/Def+X
during combat. (Calculates X based on number
of your defensive structures: ≥5 structures
grants +10; 4 grants +7; 3 grants +4; ≤2 grants
+1. Destroyed defensive structures are not
counted.)

SID_追撃隊形・奇数1.name: Odd Follow-Up 1
SID_追撃隊形・奇数1.description:
If it is an odd-numbered turn and unit's HP =
100%, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up
attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

SID_追撃隊形・奇数2.name: Odd Follow-Up 2
SID_追撃隊形・奇数2.description:
If it is an odd-numbered turn and unit's HP ≥
50%, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack
and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

SID_追撃隊形・奇数3.name: Odd Follow-Up 3
SID_追撃隊形・奇数3.description:
If it is an odd-numbered turn, unit makes a
guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot
make a follow-up attack.

SID_速さ魔防の大共謀1.name: Spd/Res Ruse 1
SID_速さ魔防の大共謀1.description:
$aIf a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets
unit, inflicts Spd/Res-1 and【Guard】on
foes in cardinal directions of unit and target
through their next actions.

【Guard】
Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target
per attack during combat through its next action.
(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

SID_速さ魔防の大共謀2.name: Spd/Res Ruse 2
SID_速さ魔防の大共謀2.description:
$aIf a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets
unit, inflicts Spd/Res-3 and【Guard】on
foes in cardinal directions of unit and target
through their next actions.

【Guard】
Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target
per attack during combat through its next action.
(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

SID_速さ魔防の大共謀3.name: Spd/Res Ruse 3
SID_速さ魔防の大共謀3.description:
$aIf a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets
unit, inflicts Spd/Res-5 and【Guard】on
foes in cardinal directions of unit and target
through their next actions.

【Guard】
Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target
per attack during combat through its next action.
(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

SID_攻撃魔防の大開放1.name: Atk/Res Gap 1
SID_攻撃魔防の大開放1.description:
At start of turn, grants Atk/Res+1 to ally
with the highest Atk+Res total for 1 turn.
(Excludes unit.)

SID_攻撃魔防の大開放2.name: Atk/Res Gap 2
SID_攻撃魔防の大開放2.description:
At start of turn, grants Atk/Res+3 to ally
with the highest Atk+Res total for 1 turn.
(Excludes unit.)

SID_攻撃魔防の大開放3.name: Atk/Res Gap 3
SID_攻撃魔防の大開放3.description:
At start of turn, grants Atk/Res+5 to ally
with the highest Atk+Res total for 1 turn.
(Excludes unit.)

SID_流星剣.name: Astra Blade
SID_流星剣.description:
Grants Atk+3. If unit's Atk > foe's Def, deals
damage = 50% of unit's Atk minus foe's Def.

SID_太陽槍.name: Sol Lance
SID_太陽槍.description:
Grants Res+3. When unit deals damage to foe
during combat, restores 10 HP to unit.
(Triggers even if 0 damage is dealt.)

SID_メランコリー.name: Melancholy
SID_メランコリー.description:
$aAfter combat, if unit attacked, resets Special
cooldown of foe, and inflicts【Guard】on foe.
(Neutralizes Special cooldown count reductions
after combat, but skills that Accelerate and
Slow Special are still effective.)

【Guard】
Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target
per attack during combat through its next action.
(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

SID_メランコリー＋.name: Melancholy+
SID_メランコリー＋.description:
$aAfter combat, if unit attacked, resets Special
cooldown of target and foes within 2 spaces of
target, and inflicts【Guard】on target and foes
within 2 spaces of target. (Neutralizes Special
cooldown count reductions after combat, but
skills that Accelerate and Slow Special are still
effective.)

【Guard】
Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target
per attack during combat through its next action.
(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

SID_攻撃速さの絆4.name: Atk/Spd Bond 4
SID_攻撃速さの絆4.description:
If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants
Atk/Spd+7 to unit and neutralizes unit's
penalties to Atk/Spd during combat.

SID_守備の相互鼓舞.name: Joint Hone Def
SID_守備の相互鼓舞.description:
At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to an ally,
grants Def+5 to unit and adjacent allies for
1 turn.

SID_杖の経験1.name: Staff Exp. 1
SID_杖の経験1.description:
While unit lives and uses a staff, unit gets
1.5x EXP. (Only highest value applied. Does
not stack.)

SID_杖の経験2.name: Staff Exp. 2
SID_杖の経験2.description:
While unit lives, all staff allies on team get
1.5x EXP. (Only highest value applied. Does
not stack.)

SID_杖の経験3.name: Staff Exp. 3
SID_杖の経験3.description:
While unit lives, all staff allies on team get
2x EXP. (Only highest value applied. Does
not stack.)

SID_マスターボウ.name: Meisterbogen
SID_マスターボウ.description:
Effective against flying foes. Inflicts Spd-5.
Unit attacks twice (even if foe initiates combat).
When under player's control, unit gains: "If unit
initiates combat, foe cannot make a follow-up
attack."

SID_ノヴァの聖戦士.name: Njörun's Zeal
SID_ノヴァの聖戦士.description:
If unit initiates combat, grants another action
to unit after combat. (Once per turn.) When
Special triggers, inflicts "restricts movement
to 1 space" on unit and Pair Up cohort through
their next action.

SID_攻撃魔防の渾身4.name: Atk/Res Push 4
SID_攻撃魔防の渾身4.description:
At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, grants
Atk/Res+7, but after combat, if unit attacked,
deals 5 damage to unit.

SID_ツバキの金薙刀.name: Golden Naginata
SID_ツバキの金薙刀.description:
Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
At start of combat, if foe's Atk ≥ unit's Atk+3,
grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3 during combat.

SID_弓騎士の名弓.name: Renowned Bow
SID_弓騎士の名弓.description:
Effective against flying foes. Inflicts Spd-5.
If unit initiates combat, unit attacks twice.

SID_白夜の竜石.name: Sun Dragonstone
SID_白夜の竜石.description:
If foe initiates combat or if a bonus granted by
a skill like Rally or Hone is not active on foe,
grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 to unit during combat.
If foe's Range = 2, calculates damage using the
lower of foe's Def or Res.

SID_レギンレイヴ.name: Reginleif
SID_レギンレイヴ.description:
Effective against armored and cavalry foes.
Grants Atk+3. If unit’s Atk > foe’s Atk and/or
extra movement granted by another skill is
active on unit, unit makes a guaranteed
follow-up attack.

SID_ラウアサーペント.name: Rauðrserpent
SID_ラウアサーペント.description:
If foe initiates combat and uses bow, dagger,
magic, or staff, grants Def/Res+6 during combat.

SID_ラウアサーペント＋.name: Rauðrserpent+
SID_ラウアサーペント＋.description:
If foe initiates combat and uses bow, dagger,
magic, or staff, grants Def/Res+6 during combat.

SID_剛剣4.name: Heavy Blade 4
SID_剛剣4.description:
If unit's Atk > foe's Atk, grants Special
cooldown charge +1 and deals +5 damage
to foe per unit's attack. (Only highest value
applied. Does not stack.)

SID_速さの混乱1.name: Sabotage Spd 1
SID_速さの混乱1.description:
At start of turn, if any foe's Res ≤ unit’s Res-3
and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts
Spd-3 on that foe through its next action.

SID_速さの混乱2.name: Sabotage Spd 2
SID_速さの混乱2.description:
At start of turn, if any foe's Res ≤ unit’s Res-3
and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts
Spd-5 on that foe through its next action.

SID_速さの混乱3.name: Sabotage Spd 3
SID_速さの混乱3.description:
At start of turn, if any foe's Res ≤ unit’s Res-3
and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts
Spd-7 on that foe through its next action.

SID_暗器の経験1.name: Dagger Exp. 1
SID_暗器の経験1.description:
While unit lives and uses a dagger, unit gets
1.5x EXP. (Only highest value applied. Does
not stack.)

SID_暗器の経験2.name: Dagger Exp. 2
SID_暗器の経験2.description:
While unit lives, all dagger allies on team get
1.5x EXP. (Only highest value applied. Does
not stack.)

SID_暗器の経験3.name: Dagger Exp. 3
SID_暗器の経験3.description:
While unit lives, all dagger allies on team get
2x EXP. (Only highest value applied. Does
not stack.)

SID_騎士軍将の宝槍.name: Prized Lance
SID_騎士軍将の宝槍.description:
Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
At start of combat, if foe’s HP = 100%, grants
Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 during combat and inflicts
Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack.
(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

SID_守りの斧.name: Rearguard
SID_守りの斧.description:
If foe initiates combat, grants Def+7 during
combat.

SID_守りの斧＋.name: Rearguard+
SID_守りの斧＋.description:
If foe initiates combat, grants Def+7 during
combat.

SID_守護者の烈弓.name: Guardian's Bow
SID_守護者の烈弓.description:
Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
Effective against flying foes. If unit's Spd > foe's
Spd at start of combat or during combat, inflicts
Atk/Spd/Def-5 on foe during combat. (If unit
and foe both have this weapon equipped, effect
is calculated first for whoever initiates combat.)

SID_竜殺の暗器.name: Dragonslasher
SID_竜殺の暗器.description:
Effective against dragon foes. Disables unit's
and foe's skills that change attack priority.
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-5 on target and foes within 2
spaces of target through their next actions.

SID_竜殺の暗器＋.name: Dragonslasher+
SID_竜殺の暗器＋.description:
Effective against dragon foes. Disables unit's
and foe's skills that change attack priority.
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-7 on target and foes within 2
spaces of target through their next actions.

SID_フィンブル.name: Fimbulvetr
SID_フィンブル.description:
$aGrants Res+3. At start of combat, if【Penalty】
is active on unit or if unit's HP < 100%,
neutralizes penalties on unit and grants
Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 during combat.

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next
action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill
like Panic or Threaten and negative status
effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting
movement, or the effects of a skill like
Triangle Adept or Guard).

SID_速さ魔防の大覚醒1.name: Brazen Spd/Res 1
SID_速さ魔防の大覚醒1.description:
At start of combat, if unit's HP ≤ 80%, grants
Spd/Res+3 during combat.

SID_速さ魔防の大覚醒2.name: Brazen Spd/Res 2
SID_速さ魔防の大覚醒2.description:
At start of combat, if unit's HP ≤ 80%, grants
Spd/Res+5 during combat.

SID_速さ魔防の大覚醒3.name: Brazen Spd/Res 3
SID_速さ魔防の大覚醒3.description:
At start of combat, if unit's HP ≤ 80%, grants
Spd/Res+7 during combat.

SID_速さ魔防の大開放1.name: Spd/Res Gap 1
SID_速さ魔防の大開放1.description:
At start of turn, grants Spd/Res+1 to ally
with the highest Spd+Res total for 1 turn.
(Excludes unit.)

SID_速さ魔防の大開放2.name: Spd/Res Gap 2
SID_速さ魔防の大開放2.description:
At start of turn, grants Spd/Res+3 to ally
with the highest Spd+Res total for 1 turn.
(Excludes unit.)

SID_速さ魔防の大開放3.name: Spd/Res Gap 3
SID_速さ魔防の大開放3.description:
At start of turn, grants Spd/Res+5 to ally

Inflicts Spd-5. Unit attacks twice (even if foe

SID_双刃.description:

SID_日傘＋_ATK.name: Petal Parasol+ (+Mt)
SID_日傘＋_ATK.description:
$aIf【Penalty】is active on foe, grants
Atk/Spd+5 during combat.

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next
action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill
like Panic or Threaten and negative status
effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting
movement, or the effects of a skill like
Triangle Adept or Guard).

$aEffective against flying foes. If【Penalty】is
active on foe, grants Atk/Spd+5 during combat.

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next
action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill
like Panic or Threaten and negative status
effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting
movement, or the effects of a skill like
Triangle Adept or Guard).

Def/Res-７ on target and foes within
2 spaces of target through their next actions.

SID_近距離反撃.name: Close Counter

SID_遠距離反撃.description: Unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range.
